  6893                                  ; for bigfat we do need to extend this logic to 32 bit sector calculation.
  6894                                  
  6895                                  dobig:					
  6896 00001E69 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 (2^4) directory entries per sector
  6897 00001E6B 52                      		push	dx		; save total sectors (high)
  6898 00001E6C 8B550C                  		mov	dx, [di+0Ch]	; [di+BDS.direntries]
  6899 00001E6F D3EA                    		shr	dx, cl		; root dir sectors = BDS.direntries / 16;
  6900 00001E71 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx
  6901 00001E73 5A                      		pop	dx
  6902 00001E74 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= total	sectors	- root dir sectors
  6903 00001E77 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1
  6904 00001E7A 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= t - r	- d
  6905                                  					; total	secs - reserved	secs - root dir	secs

  6911                                  
  6912                                  		; 29/12/2018 - Erdogan Tan (Retro DOS v4.0)
  6913                                  		; 27/09/2022
  6914                                  		; (Microsoft FAT32 File	System Specification,
  6915                                  		; December 2000, Page 21)
  6916                                  		; TmpVal1 = DskSize - (BPB_ResvdSecCnt+RootrDirSectors)
  6917                                  		; TmpVal2 = (256*BPB_SecPerClus)+BPB_NumFATs
  6918                                  		; 8/8/2023 (Retro DOS v5.0)
  6919                                  		; If(FATType == FAT32)
  6920                                  		;   TmpVal2 = TmpVal2 / 2;
  6921                                  		; FATsz	= (TmpVal1+(TmpVal2-1))/TmpVal2
  6922                                  		; 8/8/2023 (Retro DOS v5.0)
  6923                                  		; If(FATType == FAT32) {
  6924                                  		;   BPB_FATSz16 = 0;
  6925                                  		;   BPB_FATSz32 = FATSz;
  6926                                  		;} else {
  6927                                  		;   BPB_FATSz16 = LOWORD(FATSz);
  6928                                  		;/* there is no BPB_FATSz32 in a FAT16 BPB */
  6929                                  		;}
  6930                                  					; dx:ax = TmpVal1, bx = TmpVal2
  6931 00001E82 01D8                    		add	ax, bx		; 
  6932 00001E84 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; dx:ax = TmpVal1+TmpVal2
  6933 00001E87 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1		
  6934 00001E8A 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax = TmpVal1+TmpVal2-1
  6935                                  
  6936                                  ; assuming dx in the table will never be bigger than bx.
  6937                                  
  6938 00001E8D F7F3                    		div	bx		; BDS.fatsecs =
  6939                                  					; ceil((total-dir-res)/(256*BDS.secperclus+2))

  6941                                  					; number of fat	sectors

  6977                                  ; to BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS and BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be set to 0.

  7238 00001FAB 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
  7239 00001FAE 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; -1
  7240 00001FB1 740A                    		jz	short got_end_of_bds_chain
  7241 00001FB3 E94DFF                  		jmp	_next_bds
  7242                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7243                                  
  7244                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7245                                  ;got_end_of_bds_chain:			
  7246                                  		;retn
  7247                                  
  7248                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7249                                  
  7250                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7251                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7252                                  
  7253                                  ; al = device number
  7254                                  
  7255                                  print_init:	
  7256 00001FB6 98                      		cbw
  7257 00001FB7 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7258 00001FB9 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7259 00001FBB CD17                    		int	17h		; PRINTER - INITIALIZE
  7260                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  7261                                  					; Return: AH = status
  7262                                  got_end_of_bds_chain:	; 18/12/2022
  7263 00001FBD C3                      		retn
  7264                                  
  7265                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7266                                  
  7267                                  ; al = device number
  7268                                  
  7269                                  aux_init:
  7270 00001FBE 98                      		cbw
  7271 00001FBF 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7272                                  		;mov	al, 0A3h	; RSINIT ; 0A3h
  7273                                  					; 2400,n,1,8 (msequ.inc)
  7274                                  		;mov	ah, 0
  7275                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7276 00001FC1 B8A300                  		mov	ax, 00A3h
  7277 00001FC4 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - INITIALIZE USART
  7278                                  					; 	AL = initializing parameters,
  7279                                  					;	DX = port number (0-3)
  7280                                  					; Return: AH = RS-232 status code bits,
  7281                                  					;	  AL = modem status bits
  7282 00001FC6 C3                      		retn
  7283                                  
  7284                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7285                                  
  7286                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7287                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7288                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7289                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
  7290                                  
  7291                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7292                                  ;
  7293                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7294                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7295                                  ;
  7296                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7297                                  ;
  7298                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7299                                  ;   initialize it.
  7300                                  ;
  7301                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7302                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7303                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7304                                  ;
  7305                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7306                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7307                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7308                                  ;
  7309                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7310                                  ;   save coding.
  7311                                  ;
  7312                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7313                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7314                                  ;
  7315                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7316                                  ;
  7317                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7318                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7319                                  ;
  7320                                  ; called modules:
  7321                                  ;		  getboot
  7322                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7323                                  ;
  7324                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7325                                  ;
  7326                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7327                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7328                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7329                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7330                                  ;
  7331                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7332                                  
  7333                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7334                                  domini:	
  7335 00001FC7 8A36[0D16]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7336                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7337 00001FCB 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7338                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7339 00001FCD 7430                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7340 00001FCF B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7341                                  domini_loop:				
  7342 00001FD1 52                      		push	dx
  7343 00001FD2 8816[0C16]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7344 00001FD6 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7345 00001FD8 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7346                                  					; DL = drive number
  7347                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7348                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7349                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7350                                  		
  7351                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7352                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2B36h
  7353                                  		;inc	dh
  7354                                  		;xor	ax, ax
  7355                                  		;mov	al, dh
  7356 00001FDA 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7357 00001FDC 88F0                    		mov	al, dh	; <= 255
  7358 00001FDE 40                      		inc	ax	; (0FFh -> 100h)
  7359 00001FDF A3[1216]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7360                                  		;and	cl, 3Fh
  7361                                  		;mov	al, cl
  7362                                  		; 08/08/2023
  7363 00001FE2 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7364 00001FE4 83E03F                  		and	ax, 3Fh
  7365 00001FE7 A3[1416]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7366 00001FEA 06                      		push	es
  7367 00001FEB 8A16[0C16]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7368 00001FEF E886FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7369                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7370 00001FF2 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7371 00001FF4 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7372                                  domininext:				
  7373 00001FF7 07                      		pop	es
  7374 00001FF8 5A                      		pop	dx
  7375 00001FF9 FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7376 00001FFB FECE                    		dec	dh
  7377 00001FFD 75D2                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7378                                  dominiret:				
  7379 00001FFF C3                      		retn
  7380                                  
  7381                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7382                                  
  7383                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7384                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7385                                  
  7386                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7387                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7388                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7389                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7390                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7391                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7392                                  ;
  7393                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7394                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7395                                  
  7396                                  
  7397                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7398 00002000 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7399                                  fmpnext:				
  7400 00002004 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7401 00002008 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7402 0000200A 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7403 0000200D 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7404 00002011 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7405                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7406                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7407                                  fmpnextfound:
  7408 00002013 C3                      		retn
  7409                                  
  7410                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7411                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7412                                  ;fmpret:
  7413                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7414                                  
  7415                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7416                                  
  7417                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7418                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7419 00002014 E8A500                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7420 00002017 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7421 00002019 8B3E[1016]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7422 0000201D C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7423                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7424 00002022 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7425                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7426                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7427 00002026 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7428                                  					; ffHardFile
  7429 0000202A C606[8E15]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7430 0000202F A1[1216]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7431 00002032 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7432 00002035 A1[1416]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7433 00002038 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7434 0000203B A0[0C16]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7435 0000203E 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7436                                  					; set physical number
  7437 00002041 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7438 00002044 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7439                                  					; set logical number
  7440 00002047 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7441 0000204C 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7442 0000204E 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7443                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7444 00002053 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7445                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7446                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7447 00002055 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7448 00002058 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7449 0000205C 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7450 0000205F D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7451 00002061 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7452 00002063 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7453 00002067 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7454                                  					; set hidden trks
  7455 0000206A 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7456 0000206E 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7457 00002072 8A16[0C16]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7458 00002076 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7459 00002079 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7460 0000207C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7461                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7462                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7463                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7464 0000207E 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7465 00002080 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7466                                  
  7467                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7468                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2C7Ch
  7469 00002083 26817F3C55AA            		cmp	word [es:bx+3Ch], 0AA55h ; 03C2h+03Ch = 3FEh
  7470 00002089 7588                    		jne	short fmpnextfound ; not a valid boot sector !
  7471                                  
  7472                                  		; 13/08/2023
  7473                                  		;push	es
  7474 0000208B E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7475                                  					; bx value saved.
  7476                                  		;pop	es  ; 13/08/2023
  7477 0000208E 7203                    		jc	short fmpnextchain
  7478 00002090 E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7479                                  fmpnextchain:
  7480 00002093 E96EFF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7481                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7482                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7483                                  
  7484                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7485                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7486                                  		;retn
  7487                                  
  7488                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7489                                  
  7490                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7491                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7492                                  
  7493                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7494                                  	
  7495 00002096 57                      		push	di
  7496 00002097 53                      		push	bx
  7497                                  		; 12/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7498                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  7499                                  		;push	ds
  7500 00002098 06                      		push	es
  7501                                  setmini_1:				
  7502 00002099 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7503 0000209D 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7504 0000209F 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7505 000020A3 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7506 000020A5 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG partition
  7507 000020A9 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7508 000020AB 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7509 000020AE 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7510 000020B2 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7511 000020B4 F9                      		stc
  7512 000020B5 07                      		pop	es
  7513                                  		; 12/08/2023
  7514                                  		;pop	ds
  7515 000020B6 5B                      		pop	bx
  7516 000020B7 5F                      		pop	di
  7517 000020B8 C3                      		retn
  7518                                  
  7519                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7520                                  setmini_2:
  7521 000020B9 E968FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7522                                  
  7523                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7524                                  
  7525                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
  7526                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS) 
  7527                                  
  7528                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7529                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7530                                  ;
  7531                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7532                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7533                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7534                                  ;
  7535                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7536                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7537                                  ;			trash ax
  7538                                  
  7539                                  dmax_check:
  7540 000020BC 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7541 000020C1 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7542 000020C3 06                      		push	es
  7543                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7544 000020C4 B84504                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7545 000020C7 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7546                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7547 000020C9 26C606[8303]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7548                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7549                                  					; set message flag
  7550                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7551 000020CF 07                      		pop	es
  7552                                  
  7553                                  		;;push	es
  7554                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7555                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7556                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7557                                  					; set message flag
  7558                                  		;;pop	es
  7559                                  		;
  7560                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7561                                  dmax_ok:
  7562 000020D0 C3                      		retn
  7563                                  
  7564                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7565                                  
  7566                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7567                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7568                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7569                                  ;								 
  7570                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7571                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7572                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7573                                  
  7574                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7575 000020D1 56                      		push	si
  7576 000020D2 53                      		push	bx
  7577 000020D3 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7578                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7579 000020D7 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7580 000020DA 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7581                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7582 000020DC 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7583 000020DE EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7584                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7585                                  
  7586                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7587                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7588 000020E0 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7589                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7590 000020E2 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7591                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7592 000020E5 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7593                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7594 000020E9 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7595                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7596                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7597 000020EC 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7598 000020EF 8B36[0E16]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7599 000020F3 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7600 000020F5 8306[0E16]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7601 000020FA FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7602 000020FE 8306[1016]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7603 00002103 5B                      		pop	bx
  7604 00002104 5E                      		pop	si
  7605 00002105 C3                      		retn
  7606                                  
  7607                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7608                                  
  7609                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7610                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7611                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7612                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7613                                  
  7614                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7615 00002106 50                      		push	ax
  7616 00002107 51                      		push	cx
  7617 00002108 52                      		push	dx
  7618 00002109 55                      		push	bp
  7619 0000210A 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7620                                  loop_clock:				
  7621 0000210C 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7622 0000210E 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7623 00002110 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7624 00002112 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7625                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7626                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7627                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7628 00002114 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7629 00002117 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7630 00002119 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7631 0000211C 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7632 0000211E 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7633 00002121 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7634 00002123 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7635 00002124 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7636                                  delay:					
  7637 00002127 E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7638 00002129 EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7639                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7640                                  
  7641                                  clock_present:				
  7642 0000212B 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7643 00002131 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7644                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7645                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7646 00002134 56                      		push	si
  7647 00002135 E8BEF2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7648 00002138 FA                      		cli
  7649                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7650 00002139 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7651 0000213D FB                      		sti
  7652 0000213E 5E                      		pop	si
  7653                                  
  7654                                  no_readdate:				
  7655 0000213F 5D                      		pop	bp
  7656 00002140 5A                      		pop	dx
  7657 00002141 59                      		pop	cx
  7658 00002142 58                      		pop	ax
  7659 00002143 C3                      		retn
  7660                                  
  7661                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7662                                  
  7663                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7664                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7665                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7666                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7667                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7668                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7669                                  ;
  7670                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7671                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7672                                  ;
  7673                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7674                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7675                                  ;
  7676                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7677                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7678                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7679                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7680                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7681                                  ;
  7682                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7683                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7684                                  
  7685                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7686                                  
  7687                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7688                                  
  7689                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7690                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7691                                  			
  7692 00002144 50                      		push	ax
  7693 00002145 2E803E[3606]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7694 0000214B 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7695 0000214D 2E803E[3706]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7696                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7697 00002153 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7698 00002155 2E803E[3706]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7699                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7700 0000215B 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7701                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7702                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7703                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7704                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7705                                  cmosck4:				
  7706 0000215D B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7707                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7708 0000215F B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7709                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7710 00002161 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7711 00002164 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7712                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7713 00002166 E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7714 00002169 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7715                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7716 0000216B 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7717 0000216D B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7718                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7719 0000216F E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7720                                  cmosck9:				
  7721 00002172 58                      		pop	ax
  7722 00002173 C3                      		retn
  7723                                  
  7724                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7725                                  
  7726                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7727                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7728                                  ;									       :
  7729                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7730                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7731                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7732                                  ;									       :
  7733                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7734                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7735                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7736                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7737                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7738                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7739                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7740                                  
  7741                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7742 00002174 9C                      		pushf
  7743 00002175 FA                      		cli
  7744 00002176 53                      		push	bx
  7745 00002177 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7746 00002178 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7747 0000217A E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7748                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7749 0000217C 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7750 0000217D E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7751 0000217F 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7752 00002181 58                      		pop	ax
  7753 00002182 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7754 00002184 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7755 00002186 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7756                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7757 00002188 90                      		nop
  7758 00002189 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7759 0000218B 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7760 0000218D 5B                      		pop	bx
  7761 0000218E 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7762 0000218F E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7763 00002192 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7764                                  
  7765                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7766                                  
  7767                                  cmos_popf:				
  7768 00002193 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7769                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7770                                  
  7771                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7772                                  
  7773                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7774                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7775                                  ;									       :
  7776                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7777                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7778                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7779                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7780                                  ;									       :
  7781                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7782                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7783                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7784                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7785                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7786                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7787                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7788                                  
  7789                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7790 00002194 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7791 00002195 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7792 00002196 FA                      		cli
  7793 00002197 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7794 00002198 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7795 0000219A E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7796                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7797 0000219C 90                      		nop
  7798 0000219D 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7799 0000219F E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7800 000021A1 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7801 000021A2 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7802 000021A4 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7803 000021A6 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7804                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7805 000021A8 90                      		nop
  7806 000021A9 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7807 000021AB 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7808 000021AC 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7809 000021AD E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7810 000021B0 C3                      		retn
  7811                                  
  7812                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7813                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7814                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7815                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7816                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7817                                  
  7818                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7819                                  ;
  7820                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7821                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7822                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7823                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7824                                  
  7825                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7826                                  
  7827                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7828                                  ;
  7829                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7830                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7831                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7832                                  
  7833                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7834                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7835                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7836                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7837                                  
  7838                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7839                                  getclus:				
  7840 000021B1 51                      		push	cx
  7841 000021B2 57                      		push	di
  7842 000021B3 2E890E[8C15]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7843 000021B8 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7844 000021BA 48                      		dec	ax
  7845 000021BB 48                      		dec	ax
  7846 000021BC F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7847                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7848                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7849 000021BE 2E0306[8815]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7850 000021C3 2E1316[8A15]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7851                                  unpack:					
  7852 000021C8 1E                      		push	ds
  7853 000021C9 50                      		push	ax
  7854 000021CA 53                      		push	bx
  7855 000021CB 2E8B36[8F15]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7856 000021D0 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7857 000021D2 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7858 000021D4 2EF606[8E15]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7859                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7860 000021DA 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7861 000021DC D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7862                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7863 000021DE 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7864                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7865 000021E0 52                      		push	dx
  7866 000021E1 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7867 000021E3 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7868 000021E6 5A                      		pop	dx
  7869 000021E7 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7870 000021E9 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7871                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7872                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7873 000021EB 2EA2[9615]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7874 000021EF 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7875 000021F0 52                      		push	dx
  7876 000021F1 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7877 000021F3 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7878 000021F6 5A                      		pop	dx
  7879                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7880 000021F7 A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7881 000021FA 2EA2[9715]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7882 000021FE 2EA1[9615]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7883                                  even_odd:				
  7884 00002202 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7885 00002203 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7886 00002204 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7887 00002206 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7888 00002208 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7889                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7890 0000220A D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7891 0000220C D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7892 0000220E D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7893                                  havclus:				
  7894 00002210 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7895 00002212 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7896 00002216 EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7897                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7898                                  
  7899                                  unpack16:				
  7900 00002218 52                      		push	dx
  7901 00002219 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7902 0000221B D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7903 0000221D 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7904 00002220 E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7905 00002223 5A                      		pop	dx
  7906 00002224 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7907                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7908                                  unpackx:				
  7909 00002226 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7910 00002227 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7911 00002228 1F                      		pop	ds
  7912 00002229 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7913 0000222B 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7914 0000222E 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7915 00002230 2E010E[8C15]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7916 00002235 EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7917                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7918                                  
  7919                                  getcl2:					
  7920 00002237 53                      		push	bx
  7921 00002238 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7922 00002239 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7923 0000223A 2EA1[8615]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7924 0000223E 2E8B0E[8C15]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7925 00002243 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7926 00002244 2E8F06[2305]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7927                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7928 00002249 1E                      		push	ds
  7929 0000224A 0E                      		push	cs
  7930 0000224B 1F                      		pop	ds
  7931 0000224C 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7932                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7933 0000224D BD[6109]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7934                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7935                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7936 00002250 E8CEF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7937 00002253 1F                      		pop	ds
  7938 00002254 5B                      		pop	bx
  7939 00002255 5F                      		pop	di
  7940 00002256 2EA1[8C15]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7941 0000225A 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7942 0000225C D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7943 0000225E 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7944 00002260 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7945 00002261 C3                      		retn
  7946                                  
  7947                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7948                                  
  7949                                  
  7950                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7951                                  ;
  7952                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7953                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7954                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7955                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7956                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7957                                  ;
  7958                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7959                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7960                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7961                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7962                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7963                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7964                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7965                                  
  7966                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7967                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7968 00002262 50                      		push	ax
  7969 00002263 51                      		push	cx
  7970 00002264 57                      		push	di
  7971 00002265 56                      		push	si
  7972 00002266 06                      		push	es
  7973 00002267 1E                      		push	ds
  7974 00002268 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7975 0000226A 2E8B0E[9415]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7976 0000226F F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7977 00002271 90                      		nop
  7978                                  
  7979                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7980                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7981                                  
  7982 00002272 06                      		push	es
  7983 00002273 1E                      		push	ds
  7984 00002274 57                      		push	di
  7985 00002275 50                      		push	ax
  7986 00002276 0E                      		push	cs
  7987 00002277 1F                      		pop	ds
  7988                                  
  7989 00002278 2EA1[8615]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7990 0000227C BD[7005]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7991                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7992                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7993 0000227F 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7994 00002280 E89EF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7995 00002283 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7996 00002284 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7997                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7998 00002288 5F                      		pop	di
  7999 00002289 1F                      		pop	ds
  8000 0000228A 07                      		pop	es
  8001 0000228B 2E3B06[9815]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  8002 00002290 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  8003 00002292 2EA3[9815]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  8004                                  					; sector number
  8005                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  8006 00002296 52                      		push	dx
  8007 00002297 2EC706[2305]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  8008                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  8009                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  8010 0000229E 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  8011 000022A0 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  8012 000022A3 2EA1[8615]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  8013 000022A7 1E                      		push	ds
  8014 000022A8 07                      		pop	es
  8015 000022A9 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  8016 000022AB 1E                      		push	ds
  8017 000022AC 0E                      		push	cs
  8018 000022AD 1F                      		pop	ds
  8019 000022AE 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8020 000022AF BD[6109]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8021                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8022                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8023 000022B2 E86CF3                  		call	call_bios_code
  8024 000022B5 1F                      		pop	ds
  8025 000022B6 5A                      		pop	dx
  8026 000022B7 2E8B0E[9415]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8027                                  
  8028                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  8029 000022BC 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  8030 000022BD 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  8031                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  8032                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  8033 000022BF 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  8034 000022C1 1F                      		pop	ds
  8035 000022C2 07                      		pop	es
  8036 000022C3 5E                      		pop	si
  8037 000022C4 5F                      		pop	di
  8038 000022C5 59                      		pop	cx
  8039 000022C6 58                      		pop	ax
  8040 000022C7 C3                      		retn
  8041                                  
  8042                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8043                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  8044                                  
  8045                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8046                                  
  8047                                  		; 09/12/2022
  8048                                  		;db 0
  8049                                  
  8050                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  8051                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  8052                                  
  8053                                  %if numbertomod>0 & numbertomod<16
  8054 000022C8 00<rep 8h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  8055                                  %endif
  8056                                  
  8057                                  ;align 16
  8058                                  
  8059                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8060                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  8061                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  8062

  8067                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022

  8073                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8074                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
  8075                                  
  8076                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0 
  8077                                  
  8078                                  ; 30/12/2022
  8079                                  ; (BIOSCODE SEGMENT is 2CCh for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)  -- ((25C0h+700h)>>4) --
  8080                                  
  8081                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  8082                                   
  8083                                  ; 02/10/2022
  8084                                  
  8085                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  8086                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8087                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8088                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8089                                  
  8090                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  8091 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  8092 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  8093                                  
  8094                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8095                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  8096                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8097                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  8098                                  
  8099                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8100                                  
  8101                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  8102                                  
  8103                                  ;************************************************************************
  8104                                  ;*									*
  8105                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  8106                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  8107                                  ;*									*
  8108                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  8109                                  ;*									*
  8110                                  ;************************************************************************
  8111                                  
  8112                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO:SYS (optimization)
  8113                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
  8114                                  
  8115                                  _seg_reinit:
  8116 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  8117                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  8118                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  8119 00000037 BF[BF06]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  8120                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  8121                                  		; 10/08/2023
  8122 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
  8123                                  _seg_reinit_1:
  8124 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  8125 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  8126 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  8127 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  8128                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
  8129                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
  8130                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
  8131 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov     [es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
  8132 00000046 CB                      		retf
  8133                                  
  8134                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8135                                  
  8136                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8137                                  
  8138                                  ;************************************************************************
  8139                                  ;*									*
  8140                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  8141                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  8142                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  8143                                  ;*									*
  8144                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  8145                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  8146                                  ;*									*
  8147                                  ;************************************************************************
  8148                                  
  8149                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  8150 00000047 56                      		push	si
  8151 00000048 50                      		push	ax
  8152 00000049 51                      		push	cx
  8153 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
  8154 0000004B 57                      		push	di
  8155 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
  8156 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
  8157 0000004E 06                      		push	es
  8158 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
  8159 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  8160 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8161                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8162                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8163 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8164 0000005A 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8165 0000005D A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8166 00000060 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8167 00000064 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8168 00000066 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8169 0000006A 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8170 0000006E 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8171 00000072 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8172 00000076 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8173                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8174 0000007A 81FE[3B05]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8175                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8176                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8177 0000007E 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8178                                  
  8179                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8180                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8181                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8182                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8183                                  ;
  8184                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8185                                  ;
  8186                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8187                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8188                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8189                                  ;
  8190                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8191                                  
  8192                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8193 00000080 C706[2305]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8194 00000086 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8195 00000089 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8196 0000008B 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8197                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8198                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8199 0000008F 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8200 00000093 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8201                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8202                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8203 00000097 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8204 00000098 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8205 0000009C 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  8206 0000009F 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  8207 000000A1 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8208 000000A2 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8209 000000A4 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8210 000000A6 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8211 000000A7 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8212 000000AB FC                      		cld
  8213                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8214 000000AC 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8215                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8216 000000B0 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8217 000000B2 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8218                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8219                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  8220                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8221                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8222 000000B4 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8223                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8224 000000B9 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8225 000000BD 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8226                                  					; mark operation complete
  8227 000000C0 5B                      		pop	bx
  8228 000000C1 07                      		pop	es
  8229 000000C2 1F                      		pop	ds
  8230 000000C3 5D                      		pop	bp
  8231 000000C4 5F                      		pop	di
  8232 000000C5 5A                      		pop	dx
  8233 000000C6 59                      		pop	cx
  8234 000000C7 58                      		pop	ax
  8235 000000C8 5E                      		pop	si
  8236 000000C9 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8237                                  	
  8238                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8239                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8240                                  bc_retf:
  8241 000000CC CB                      		retf
  8242                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8243                                  
  8244                                  command_error:				
  8245 000000CD E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8246 000000D0 EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8247                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8248                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8249                                  
  8250                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8251                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8252                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8253                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8254                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8255                                  ; high.
  8256                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8257                                  
  8258                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8259                                  
  8260                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8261                                  
  8262 000000D2 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8263                                  
  8264 000000D4 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8265                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8266                                  		
  8267                                  
  8268                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8269                                  
  8270                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8271                                  
  8272                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8273 000000D9 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8274                                  					; unknown command error
  8275                                  
  8276                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8277                                  
  8278                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8279                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8280                                  
  8281                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8282                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8283                                  
  8284                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8285                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8286                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8287 000000DB C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8288 000000DF 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8289                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8290 000000E3 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8291 000000E5 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8292 000000E6 C3                      		retn
  8293                                  
  8294                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8295                                  
  8296                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8297
