  8299                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8300                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8301                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8302                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8303                                  
  8304                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8305                                  
  8306                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8307                                  
  8308                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8309                                  
  8310                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8311                                  
  8312                                  ;************************************************************************
  8313                                  ;*									*
  8314                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8315                                  ;*									*
  8316                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8317                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8318                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8319                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8320                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8321                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8322                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8323                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8324                                  ;*									*
  8325                                  ;************************************************************************
  8326                                  
  8327                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8328                                  		;db 0
  8329                                  
  8330                                  		; 13/12/202
  8331 000000E7 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8332                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8333 000000E8 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8334                                  					; 00 init
  8335 000000EA [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8336 000000EC [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8337 000000EE [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8338                                  					; 03
  8339 000000F0 [5F01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8340                                  					; 04
  8341 000000F2 [A201]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8342                                  					; 05
  8343 000000F4 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8344 000000F6 [0B02]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8345                                  					; 07
  8346 000000F8 [FF01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8347                                  					; 08
  8348 000000FA [FF01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8349 000000FC [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8350                                  con_table_end:
  8351 000000FE 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8352                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8353 000000FF [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8354 00000101 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8355 00000103 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8356 00000105 [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8357 00000107 [1C02]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8358                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8359 00000109 [CA01]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8360                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8361 0000010B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8362 0000010D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8363 0000010F [2102]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8364 00000111 [2102]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8365 00000113 [5202]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8366 00000115 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8367 00000117 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8368 00000119 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8369 0000011B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8370 0000011D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8371 0000011F [8C02]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8372 00000121 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8373 00000123 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8374 00000125 [BA02]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8375 00000127 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8376 00000129 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8377 0000012B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8378 0000012D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8379 0000012F [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8380 00000131 [EF02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8381                                  prn_table_end:
  8382 00000133 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8383                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8384 00000134 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8385 00000136 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8386 00000138 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8387 0000013A [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8388 0000013C [0A03]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8389 0000013E [2F03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8390 00000140 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8391 00000142 [6503]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8392 00000144 [6C03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8393 00000146 [6C03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8394 00000148 [4F03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8395                                  aux_table_end:
  8396 0000014A 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8397                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8398 0000014B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8399 0000014D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8400 0000014F [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8401 00000151 [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8402 00000153 [D104]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8403 00000155 [CA01]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8404 00000157 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8405 00000159 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8406 0000015B [D203]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8407 0000015D [D203]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8408                                  tim_table_end:
  8409                                  
  8410                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8411                                  
  8412                                  ;************************************************************************
  8413                                  ;*									*
  8414                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8415                                  ;*									*
  8416                                  ;************************************************************************
  8417                                  
  8418                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8419                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8420 0000015F E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8421                                  con_loop:				
  8422 00000161 E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8423 00000164 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8424 00000165 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8425                                  con_exit:				
  8426 00000167 F8                      		clc
  8427 00000168 C3                      		retn
  8428                                  
  8429                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8430                                  
  8431                                  ;************************************************************************
  8432                                  ;*									*
  8433                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8434                                  ;*									*
  8435                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8436                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8437                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8438                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8439                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8440                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8441                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8442                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8443                                  ;*									*
  8444                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8445                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8446                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8447                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8448                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8449                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8450                                  ;*									*
  8451                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8452                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8453                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8454                                  ;*									*
  8455                                  ;************************************************************************
  8456                                  
  8457                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8458                                  chrin:		
  8459 00000169 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8460 0000016D 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8461 0000016F 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8462 00000173 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8463 00000175 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8464 00000177 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8465 00000179 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8466 0000017B 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8467 0000017D 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8468 00000180 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8469 00000182 B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8470 00000184 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8471                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8472                                  
  8473                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8474                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8475                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8476                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8477                                  ;      else
  8478                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8479                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8480                                  ;      endif
  8481                                  ;    endif
  8482                                  ;  endif
  8483                                  
  8484                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8485 00000186 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8486 0000018B 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8487 0000018D 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8488 0000018F 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8489 00000191 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8490 00000193 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8491 00000195 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8492 00000197 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8493                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8494                                  
  8495                                  not_ext:				
  8496 00000199 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8497 0000019B 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8498                                  alt_save:				
  8499 0000019D 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8500                                  keyret:					
  8501 000001A1 C3                      		retn
  8502                                  
  8503                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8504                                  
  8505                                  ;************************************************************************
  8506                                  ;*									*
  8507                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8508                                  ;*									*
  8509                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8510                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8511                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8512                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8513                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8514                                  ;*									*
  8515                                  ;************************************************************************
  8516                                  
  8517                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8518                                  con_rdnd:				
  8519 000001A2 A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8520 000001A5 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8521 000001A7 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8522 000001A9 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8523 000001AD CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8524 000001AF 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8525 000001B1 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8526 000001B6 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8527 000001B8 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8528                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8529 000001BC 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8530                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8531 000001C1 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8532 000001C3 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8533 000001C6 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8534 000001C8 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8535                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8536                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8537                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8538                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8539 000001CA F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8540 000001CB B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8541 000001CD C3                      		retn
  8542                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8543                                  
  8544                                  gotchr:					
  8545 000001CE 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8546 000001D0 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8547 000001D2 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8548 000001D6 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8549 000001D8 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8550                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8551                                  
  8552                                  notbrk:					
  8553 000001DA 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8554 000001DD 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8555 000001DF B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8556 000001E1 EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8557                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8558                                  
  8559                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8560 000001E3 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8561 000001E8 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8562 000001EA 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8563 000001EC 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8564 000001EE 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8565 000001F1 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8566 000001F3 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8567                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8568                                  rdexit:					
  8569 000001F5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8570 000001F9 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8571                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8572                                  bc_exvec:				
  8573 000001FD F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8574                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8575 000001FE C3                      		retn
  8576                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8577                                  
  8578                                  ;************************************************************************
  8579                                  ;*									*
  8580                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8581                                  ;*									*
  8582                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8583                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8584                                  ;*									*
  8585                                  ;************************************************************************
  8586                                  
  8587                                  con_writ:
  8588                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8589 000001FF E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8590                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8591                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8592                                  con_lp:					
  8593 00000201 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8594 00000204 47                      		inc	di
  8595 00000205 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8596                                  					; AL = character to display
  8597 00000207 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8598                                  cc_ret:					
  8599 00000209 F8                      		clc
  8600 0000020A C3                      		retn
  8601                                  
  8602                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8603                                  
  8604                                  ;************************************************************************
  8605                                  ;*									*
  8606                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8607                                  ;*									*
  8608                                  ;************************************************************************
  8609                                  
  8610                                  con_flush:
  8611 0000020B C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8612                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8613 00000210 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8614 00000212 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8615                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8616                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8617                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8618 00000214 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8619 00000216 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8620 00000218 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8621                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8622 0000021A EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8623                                  
  8624                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8625                                  
  8626                                  ; 15/10/2022

  8628                                  ;************************************************************************
  8629                                  ;*									*
  8630                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8631                                  ;*									*
  8632                                  ;************************************************************************
  8633                                  
  8634                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8635                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8636                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8637                                  
  8638                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8639                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8640                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8641                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8642                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8643                                  ;
  8644                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8645                                  
  8646                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8647                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8648                                  
  8649                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8650                                  
  8651                                  ;************************************************************************
  8652                                  ;*									*
  8653                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8654                                  ;*									*
  8655                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8656                                  ;*									*
  8657                                  ;************************************************************************
  8658                                  
  8659                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8660 0000021C E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8661                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8662                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8663                                  prn_done:
  8664 0000021F F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8665 00000220 C3                      		retn
  8666                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8667                                  
  8668                                  ;************************************************************************
  8669                                  ;*									*
  8670                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8671                                  ;*									*
  8672                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8673                                  ;*									*
  8674                                  ;************************************************************************
  8675                                  
  8676                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8677                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8678 00000221 E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8679                                  prn_loop:				
  8680 00000223 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8681                                  prn_out:				
  8682 00000226 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8683 00000229 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8684 0000022B 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8685 0000022E 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8686 00000230 E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8687 00000233 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8688 00000235 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8689 00000238 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8690 0000023A B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8691 0000023C C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8692 00000241 EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8693                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8694                                  
  8695                                  _prnwf:					
  8696 00000243 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8697 00000246 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8698                                  TestPrnError:				
  8699 00000248 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8700 00000249 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8701                                  pmessg:					
  8702 0000024B E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8703                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8704                                  
  8705                                  prn_con:				
  8706 0000024E 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8707 0000024F E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8708                                  ;prn_done:				
  8709                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8710                                  prn_done2:
  8711                                  		;clc
  8712                                  		; cf=0
  8713 00000251 C3                      		retn
  8714                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8715                                  
  8716                                  ;************************************************************************
  8717                                  ;*									*
  8718                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8719                                  ;*									*
  8720                                  ;************************************************************************
  8721                                  
  8722                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8723 00000252 E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8724 00000255 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8725 00000257 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8726                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8727                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8728 0000025A 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8729 0000025C E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8730                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8731                                  
  8732                                  ;************************************************************************
  8733                                  ;*									*
  8734                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8735                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8736                                  ;*									*
  8737                                  ;************************************************************************
  8738                                  
  8739                                  prnstat:				
  8740 0000025F B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8741                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8742                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8743                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8744                                  
  8745                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8746                                  
  8747                                  ;************************************************************************
  8748                                  ;*									*
  8749                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8750                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8751                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8752                                  ;*									*
  8753                                  ;************************************************************************
  8754                                  
  8755                                  prnop:	
  8756 00000261 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8757 00000265 CD17                    		int	17h		
  8758                                  
  8759                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8760                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8761                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8762                                  
  8763 00000267 50                      		push	ax
  8764 00000268 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8765 0000026B 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8766 0000026E 58                      		pop	ax
  8767 0000026F 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8768 00000271 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8769 00000274 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8770                                  
  8771                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8772                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8773                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8774                                  
  8775                                  NextTest:				
  8776 00000277 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8777                                  					; i/o error?
  8778 0000027A 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8779                                  
  8780                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8781                                  
  8782 0000027C B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8783                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8784 0000027E F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8785 00000281 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8786 00000283 FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8787                                  ret1:					
  8788 00000285 C3                      		retn
  8789                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8790                                  
  8791                                  checknotready:				
  8792 00000286 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8793 00000288 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8794 0000028B C3                      		retn
  8795                                  
  8796                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8797                                  
  8798                                  ;************************************************************************
  8799                                  ;*									*
  8800                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8801                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8802                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8803                                  ;*									*
  8804                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8805                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8806                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8807                                  ;*									*
  8808                                  ;************************************************************************
  8809                                  
  8810                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8811                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8812 0000028C 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8813                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8814 0000028E 51                      		push	cx
  8815 0000028F 53                      		push	bx
  8816 00000290 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8817 00000292 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8818 00000296 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8819                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8820 00000298 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8821 0000029C 5B                      		pop	bx
  8822                                  prn_getstat:				
  8823 0000029D E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8824 000002A0 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8825 000002A2 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8826 000002A5 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8827 000002A7 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8828 000002A8 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8829 000002AA 26                      		es
  8830 000002AB AC                      		lodsb
  8831                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8832                                  					; lodsb
  8833 000002AC 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8834 000002AE E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8835 000002B1 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8836 000002B3 E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8837                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8838                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8839                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8840 000002B5 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8841                                  
  8842                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8843                                  
  8844                                  prn_bperr:				
  8845 000002B6 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8846                                  prn_berr:				
  8847 000002B7 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8848                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8849                                  
  8850                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8851                                  
  8852                                  ;************************************************************************
  8853                                  ;*									*
  8854                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8855                                  ;*									*
  8856                                  ;************************************************************************
  8857                                  
  8858                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8859                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8860                                  
  8861                                  ;********************************;*
  8862                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8863                                  ;********************************;*
  8864                                  
  8865                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8866                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8867                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8868                                  
  8869                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8870                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8871                                  ;;endstruc
  8872                                  
  8873                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8874                                  
  8875                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8876                                  
  8877                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8878                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8879 000002BA C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8880 000002BE 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8881                                  					; ioc_pc
  8882 000002C3 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8883                                  
  8884                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8885 000002C5 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8886                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8887                                  
  8888                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8889 000002C8 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8890 000002CC 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8891 000002D0 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8892                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8893 000002D2 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8894 000002D6 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8895                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8896 000002D8 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8897 000002DC 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8898 000002DE 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8899 000002E0 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8900 000002E2 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8901 000002E4 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8902                                  prngetcount:				
  8903                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8904 000002E7 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8905 000002EB 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8906                                  					; return current retry count
  8907                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8908                                  		; cf=0
  8909                                  		;clc
  8910 000002EE C3                      		retn
  8911                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8912                                  
  8913                                  ;************************************************************************
  8914                                  ;*									*
  8915                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
  8916                                  ;*									*
  8917                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
  8918                                  ;************************************************************************
  8919                                  
  8920                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h
  8921 000002EF C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8922 000002F3 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8923                                  					; ioc_pc
  8924 000002F8 750D                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8925 000002FA 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8926 000002FE 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  8927 00000300 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported
  8928 00000302 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; SET_RETRY_COUNT
  8929 00000304 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8930                                  IOCtlSupported:	
  8931                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8932                                  		; cf=0		
  8933                                  		;clc
  8934 00000306 C3                      		retn

  8936                                  
  8937                                  prn_query_err:
  8938                                  		; 12/12/2022				
  8939                                  		;stc
  8940 00000307 E9CFFD                  		jmp	bc_cmderr ; (bc_cmderr sets cf to 1)
  8941                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8942                                  
  8943                                  ;************************************************************************
  8944                                  ;*									*
  8945                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8946                                  ;*									*
  8947                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8948                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8949                                  ;*									*
  8950                                  ;************************************************************************
  8951                                  
  8952                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8953                                  
  8954                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8955                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8956                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8957                                  
  8958                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8959                                  
  8960                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8961                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8962                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8963                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8964                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8965                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8966                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8967                                  
  8968                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8969                                  
  8970                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8971                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8972                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8973                                  
  8974                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8975                                  
  8976                                  ;************************************************************************
  8977                                  ;*									*
  8978                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8979                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8980                                  ;*									*
  8981                                  ;************************************************************************
  8982                                  
  8983                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8984                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8985 0000030A E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8986 0000030C E87500                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8987 0000030F 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8988 00000311 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8989 00000313 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8990 00000315 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8991                                  aux1:					
  8992 00000317 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8993                                  					; won't return if error
  8994                                  aux2:					
  8995 0000031A AA                      		stosb
  8996 0000031B E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  8997                                  exvec2:					
  8998 0000031D F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  8999                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  9000 0000031E C3                      		retn

  9002                                  
  9003                                  ;************************************************************************
  9004                                  ;*									*
  9005                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  9006                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  9007                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  9008                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  9009                                  ;*									*

  9012                                  auxin:

  9016                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  9017                                  		;retn
  9018                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  9019 00000327 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  9020                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9021                                  
  9022                                  arbad:					
  9023 00000329 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  9024                                  		;xor	al, al
  9025                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  9026                                  		; 11/08/2023
  9027 0000032A B0B0                    		mov	al, 0B0h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0334h
  9028 0000032C E9ACFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9029                                  
  9030                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9031                                  
  9032                                  ;************************************************************************
  9033                                  ;*									*
  9034                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  9035                                  ;*									*
  9036                                  ;************************************************************************
  9037                                  
  9038                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  9039 0000032F E85200                  		call	getbx
  9040 00000332 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  9041 00000334 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  9042 00000336 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  9043 00000338 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  9044 0000033B F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  9045 0000033E 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9046 00000340 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  9047 00000342 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9048 00000344 E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  9049 00000347 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  9050                                  auxdrx:					
  9051 00000349 E9A9FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  9052                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9053                                  
  9054                                  auxbus:					
  9055 0000034C E97BFE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit

  9057                                  
  9058                                  ;************************************************************************
  9059                                  ;*									*

  9061                                  ;*									*

  9063                                  
  9064                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h

  9066 00000352 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
  9067 00000354 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9068 00000356 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  9069 00000359 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9070                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9071                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  9072                                  		;clc
  9073 0000035B C3                      		retn
  9074                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9075                                  
  9076                                  ;************************************************************************
  9077                                  ;*									*
  9078                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  9079                                  ;*									*
  9080                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  9081                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9082                                  ;*									*
  9083                                  ;************************************************************************
  9084                                  
  9085                                  auxstat:				
  9086 0000035C B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  9087                                  
  9088                                  		; fall into auxop
  9089                                  
  9090                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9091                                  
  9092                                  ;************************************************************************
  9093                                  ;*									*
  9094                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  9095                                  ;*									*
  9096                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  9097                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  9098                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9099                                  ;*									*
  9100                                  ;************************************************************************
  9101                                  
  9102                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  9103 0000035E 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  9104                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  9105                                  					; get port number
  9106 00000362 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  9107                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  9108                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  9109 00000364 C3                      		retn
  9110                                  
  9111                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9112                                  
  9113                                  ;************************************************************************
  9114                                  ;*									*
  9115                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  9116                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  9117                                  ;*									*
  9118                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  9119                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  9120                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  9121                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  9122                                  ;*									*
  9123                                  ;************************************************************************
  9124                                  
  9125                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  9126 00000365 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  9127 00000368 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  9128                                  					; zero out buffer
  9129                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9130                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9131                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  9132 0000036B C3                      		retn
  9133                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9134                                  
  9135                                  ;************************************************************************
  9136                                  ;*									*
  9137                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  9138                                  ;*									*
  9139                                  ;************************************************************************
  9140                                  
  9141                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  9142                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  9143 0000036C E3AF                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9144                                  aux_loop:				
  9145 0000036E 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  9146                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  9147 00000371 47                      		inc	di
  9148 00000372 B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  9149 00000374 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  9150 00000377 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  9151 0000037A 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  9152 0000037C B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  9153 0000037E E95AFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  9154                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9155                                  
  9156                                  awok:					
  9157 00000381 E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  9158                                  					; still	more character to print
  9159                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9160                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9161                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  9162 00000383 C3                      		retn
  9163                                  
  9164                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9165                                  
  9166                                  ;************************************************************************
  9167                                  ;*									*
