 11574 00000C82 C3                      		retn
 11575                                  
 11576                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11577                                  
 11578                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11579                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11580                                  
 11581                                  set_tim:

 11583 00000C84 E898F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11584                                  
 11585                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11586                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11587                                  
 11588 00000C87 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]

 11598                                  done_set:

 11600                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11601 00000CA1 58                      		pop	ax
 11602 00000CA2 C3                      		retn

 11604                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11605                                  
 11606                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11607                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11608                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11609                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11610                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11611                                  
 11612                                  again:	
 11613 00000CA3 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11614 00000CA6 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11615 00000CA9 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11616                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11617 00000CAB 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11618 00000CAC C3                      		retn
 11619                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11620                                  
 11621                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11622 00000CAD 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11623 00000CAF C3                      		retn

 11729                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11730                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11731                                  ;
 11732                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11733                                  ;
 11734                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11735                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11736                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11737                                  ;
 11738                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11739                                  
 11740                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11741                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11742                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11743 00000CE0 E88DF8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11744 00000CE3 06                      		push	es
 11745 00000CE4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11746 00000CE8 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11747                                  					; RAWIO
 11748 00000CED 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11749 00000CF1 07                      		pop	es
 11750 00000CF2 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11751                                  
 11752                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11753                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11754                                  
 11755                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11756 00000CF4 BE[B10C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11757                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11758                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11759 00000CF7 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11760 00000CF9 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11761                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11762 00000CFB BE[C40C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11763                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11764                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11765                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11766 00000CFE 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11767 00000D00 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11768 00000D02 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11769 00000D05 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11770 00000D07 98                      		cbw
 11771 00000D08 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11772 00000D0A 46                      		inc	si

 11775                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11776 00000D10 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11777                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11778                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11779 00000D15 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11780 00000D17 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11781                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11782

 11795                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11796                                  ;
 11797                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11798                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11799                                  ;
 11800                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11801                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11802                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11803                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG

 11807                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11808                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11809

 11812                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer

 11824                                  		; copy recommended bpb

 12027                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12028                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12029                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12030                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12031                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12032                                  ;
 12033                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12034                                  ;
 12035                                  ; output:
 12036                                  ;	for status call:
 12037                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12038                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12039                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12040                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12041                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12042                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12043                                  ;
 12044                                  ;	for format track:
 12045                                  ;		carry set if error
 12046                                  ;
 12047                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12048                                  
 12049                                  ; 16/03/2019

 12201                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12202                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12203                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12204                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12205                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 12206                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 12207                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 12208                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 12209                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay

 12313                                  
 12314                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12315                                  
 12316                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12317                                  
 12318                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12319                                  ;
 12320                                  ; TrackIo:
 12321                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12322                                  ;
 12323                                  ;   input:
 12324                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12325                                  ;		  3 = write
 12326                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12327                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12328                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12329                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12330                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12331                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12332                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12333                                  ;
 12334                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12335                                  
 12336                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12337                                  		
 12338                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12339                                  TrackIo:	
 12340                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12341 00000F92 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12342 00000F96 E83FF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 12343 00000F99 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12344                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 12345 00000F9E 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 12346 00000FA0 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 12347 00000FA1 51                      		push	cx
 12348 00000FA2 E88FFA                  		call	iosetup
 12349 00000FA5 59                      		pop	cx
 12350 00000FA6 58                      		pop	ax
 12351                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the

 12571                                  
 12572                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12573                                  
 12574                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12575                                  ;
 12576                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12577                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12578                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12579                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12580                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12581                                  ;
 12582                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12583                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12584                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12585                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12586                                  ;
 12587                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12588                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12589                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12590                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12591                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12592                                  ;
 12593                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12594                                  
 12595                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12596                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12597 00001075 51                      		push	cx
 12598 00001076 52                      		push	dx
 12599                                  
 12600                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12601                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12602                                  
 12603 00001077 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12604 0000107C 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12605 0000107E 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12606 00001080 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12607 00001085 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12608 00001087 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12609                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12610

 12619                                  
 12620 0000108F 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12621                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12622                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12623 00001094 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12624 00001098 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12625

 12627                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.

 12633 000010A3 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12634 000010A7 49                      		dec	cx

 12646 000010BF CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12647                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12648 000010C1 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12649 000010C3 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12650 000010C8 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12651 000010CA 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12652                                  
 12653                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12654                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12655 000010CB 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12656 000010CD 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0

 12659 000010D0 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]

 12732                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12733                                  ;
 12734                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12735                                  ;
 12736                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12737                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12738                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12739                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12740                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!

 12750                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12751                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12752 00001111 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12753                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12754                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.

 12756                                  ResetDisk_cont:

 12759 00001116 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12760                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)

 12769                                  
 12770                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12771                                  ;
 12772                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12773                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12774                                  ;
 12775                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12776                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12777                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12778                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12779                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12780                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12781                                  ;
 12782                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12783                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12784                                  ;
 12785                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12786                                  
 12787                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12788                                  ToRom:	
 12789 0000111F 53                      		push	bx
 12790 00001120 56                      		push	si
 12791                                  
 12792                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12793                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12794                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12795                                  
 12796 00001121 F606[3006]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12797 00001126 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 12798 00001128 50                      		push	ax

 12800 0000112A 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]

 12805 00001134 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12806                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12807                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12808 00001139 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12809 0000113D 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12810                                  		
 12811 00001141 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 12812 00001144 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]

 12815                                  					; Important for	format

 12817                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12818                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12819 00001154 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12820 00001155 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12821 00001157 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12822                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12823 0000115C 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12824 0000115D 58                      		pop	ax
 12825                                  GotValidDpt:

 12840                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12841                                  
 12842                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12843                                  
 12844                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12845                                  ;
 12846                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12847                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12848                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12849                                  ;
 12850                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12851                                  
 12852                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12853                                  ioctl_getown:
 12854 00001177 E8F6F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12855 0000117A 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12856                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12857 0000117E C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12858                                  ownloop:				
 12859 00001182 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12860 00001186 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12861                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12862 00001188 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12863                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12864                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12865 0000118D 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 12866                                  getnextBDS:				
 12867 0000118F 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12868 00001192 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12869                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12870                                  
 12871                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12872                                  ;
 12873                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12874                                  ; in al to al.
 12875                                  ;
 12876                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12877                                  
 12878                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12879                                  ioctl_setown:
 12880 00001194 E8D9F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12881 00001197 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12882                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12883 0000119C E839F7                  		call	checksingle
 12884                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12885 0000119F FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 12886                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12887                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12888                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12889                                  
 12890                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12891                                  ;
 12892                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12893                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12894                                  ;
 12895                                  ; ==========================================================================

 12897                                  exitown:				
 12898 000011A3 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12899                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12900 000011A5 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12901                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12902                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12903 000011AA 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12904 000011AC 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12905                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12906                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12907 000011B0 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12908                                  exitnomult:

 12911                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12912                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12913                                  		; cf=0
 12914                                  		;clc
 12915 000011B9 C3                      		retn

 12969                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12970                                  ;	get media id
 12971                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12972                                  ;
 12973                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12974                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12975                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12976                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12977                                  ;
 12978                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12979                                  ;
 12980                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12981                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12982                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12983                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12984                                  ;
 12985                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12986                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12987                                  ;
 12988                                  ; LOGIC:
 12989                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12990                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12991                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12992                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12993                                  ;
 12994                                  ; {
 12995                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12996                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12997                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12998                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12999                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13000                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13001                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13002                                  ;		};
 13003                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13004                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13005                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13006                                  ;		};
 13007                                  ;	else
 13008                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13009                                  ;
 13010                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13011                                  
 13012                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13013                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13014                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13015                                  
 13016                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13017                                  GetMediaId:
 13018 000011E8 E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13019 000011EB 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13020 000011EF C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13021 000011F4 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13022 000011F7 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13023                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13024 000011F9 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13025                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13026 000011FE 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13027                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13028 00001200 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13029 00001203 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13030                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13031                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13032 00001206 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13033 00001208 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13034 0000120C 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13035                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13036 00001210 46                      		inc	si
 13037                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13038                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13039 00001211 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13040 00001214 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13041                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13042                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13043 00001217 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13044                                  	
 13045                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13046                                  		; cf = 0
 13047                                  		;clc
 13048                                  
 13049 00001219 C3                      		retn
 13050                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13051                                  
 13052                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 13053 0000121A B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13054 0000121C F9                      		stc
 13055                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 13056 0000121D C3                      		retn
 13057                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13058                                  
 13059                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13060                                  
 13061                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13062                                  ;  set media id
 13063                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13064                                  
 13065                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13066                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13067                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13068                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13069                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13070                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13071                                  ;
 13072                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13073                                  ;
 13074                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13075                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13076                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13077                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13078                                  ;
 13079                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13080                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13081                                  ;
 13082                                  ; logic:
 13083                                  ;
 13084                                  ; {
 13085                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13086                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13087                                  ;	BootIo;
 13088                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13089                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13090                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13091                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13092                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13093                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13094                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13095                                  ;		};
 13096                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13097                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13098                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13099                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13100                                  ;		};
 13101                                  ;	else
 13102                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13103                                  ;
 13104                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13105                                  
 13106                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13107                                  SetMediaId:
 13108 0000121E E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13109 00001221 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13110                                  					; Logical drive	number
 13111 00001225 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 13112 00001227 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 13113 0000122C 52                      		push	dx
 13114 0000122D E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13115 00001230 5A                      		pop	dx
 13116 00001231 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 13117                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13118 00001233 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13119                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13120 00001238 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 13121 0000123A 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13122                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13123 0000123F 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 13124 00001241 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 13125 00001242 57                      		push	di
 13126 00001243 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 13127 00001244 07                      		pop	es
 13128 00001245 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13129 00001248 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 13130 0000124C C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13131 0000124F 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13132 00001252 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13133                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13134                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13135 00001255 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 13136 00001257 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 13137 00001258 1F                      		pop	ds
 13138 00001259 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 13139 0000125A 07                      		pop	es
 13140 0000125B E876F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 13141 0000125E 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13142 00001260 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 13143 00001265 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 13144 00001268 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 13145                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 13146                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 13147 0000126D C3                      		retn
 13148                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13149                                  
 13150                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 13151 0000126E B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13152 00001270 F9                      		stc
 13153                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 13154 00001271 C3                      		retn
