 13156                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13157                                  
 13158                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13159                                  
 13160                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13161                                  ;	BootIo
 13162                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13163                                  ;
 13164                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 13165                                  ;
 13166                                  ; input :
 13167                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 13168                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 13169                                  ;
 13170                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 13171                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 13172                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 13173                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 13174                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13175                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13176                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 13177                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 13178                                  ;
 13179                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13180                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 13181                                  ;
 13182                                  ; logic:
 13183                                  ;
 13184                                  ; {
 13185                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 13186                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 13187                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13188                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13189                                  ; }
 13190                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13191                                  
 13192                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13193                                  BootIo:	
 13194 00001272 06                      		push	es
 13195 00001273 57                      		push	di
 13196 00001274 53                      		push	bx
 13197 00001275 1E                      		push	ds
 13198 00001276 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13199                                  
 13200                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13201                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13202                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13203                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13204                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13205                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13206                                  
 13207 00001277 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13208 0000127A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13209 0000127C 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13210 00001280 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13211 00001283 E8E0F6                  		call	diskio
 13212 00001286 5B                      		pop	bx
 13213 00001287 5F                      		pop	di
 13214 00001288 07                      		pop	es
 13215 00001289 C3                      		retn
 13216                                  
 13217                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13218                                  
 13219                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13220                                  
 13221                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13222                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 13223                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13224                                  ;
 13225                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 13226                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 13227                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 13228                                  ; history in the flags.
 13229                                  ;
 13230                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 13231                                  ;
 13232                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 13233                                  ;
 13234                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 13235                                  ;
 13236                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13237                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 13238                                  ;
 13239                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13240                                  
 13241                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 13242 0000128A 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13243 0000128E 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 13244 00001290 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 13245                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13246 00001292 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 13247                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13248                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 13249 00001297 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13250 00001299 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13251 0000129E 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13252 000012A0 E8EB06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13253 000012A3 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13254                                  
 13255                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13256                                  
 13257 000012A5 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13258 000012A7 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13259                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13260                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13261 000012A9 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13262 000012AB 53                      		push	bx
 13263 000012AC BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13264                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13265                                  					; physical drive
 13266 000012AF E8B506                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13267 000012B2 5B                      		pop	bx
 13268                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13269 000012B3 C3                      		retn
 13270                                  
 13271                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13272                                  
 13273                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13274                                  
 13275                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13276                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13277                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13278                                  ;
 13279                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13280                                  ;
 13281                                  ; INPUT :
 13282                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13283                                  ;
 13284                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13285                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13286                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13287                                  
 13288                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13289                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 13290 000012B4 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13291 000012B8 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13292                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13293                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13294 000012BB 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13295                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13296 000012BD 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13297                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13298                                  					; unformatted_media
 13299 000012C2 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13300 000012C4 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13301                                  
 13302                                  GafDone:				
 13303 000012C6 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13304 000012C9 C3                      		retn
 13305                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13306                                  
 13307                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13308                                  
 13309                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13310                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13311                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13312                                  ;
 13313                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13314                                  ;
 13315                                  ; input :
 13316                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13317                                  ;
 13318                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13319                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13320                                  
 13321                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13322                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13323 000012CA C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13324 000012CE C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13325                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13326 000012D1 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13327                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13328                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13329 000012D6 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13330 000012DA 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13331                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13332 000012DC 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13333                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13334                                  					; unformatted_media
 13335                                  saf_Done:				
 13336 000012E1 C3                      		retn
 13337                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13338                                  
 13339                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13340                                  
 13341                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13342                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13343                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13344                                  ;
 13345                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13346                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13347                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13348                                  ;
 13349                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13350                                  
 13351                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13352                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13353 000012E2 06                      		push	es
 13354 000012E3 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13355 000012E7 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13356                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13357                                  
 13358                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13359                                  		;cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 13360                                  		;			; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 13361                                  		;jz	short ioctl_support
 13362                                  
 13363 000012EB 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13364                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13365 000012ED 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13366                                  ioctl_support:
 13367 000012EF 0E                      		push	cs
 13368 000012F0 07                      		pop	es
 13369                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13370                                  		;mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13371 000012F1 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13372                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13373 000012F4 BF[D50C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13374                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13375                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 13376 000012F7 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 13377 000012F9 F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13378 000012FB 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 13379 000012FD B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 13380                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13381                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 13382                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 13383                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 13384                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 13385                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13386                                  ioctlsupexit:
 13387 00001300 07                      		pop	es
 13388                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13389                                  		; cf = 0
 13390                                  		;clc
 13391 00001301 C3                      		retn
 13392                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13393                                  nosupport:
 13394 00001302 07                      		pop	es
 13395 00001303 E9D3ED                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 13396                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13397                                  
 13398                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13399                                  
 13400                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13401                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 13402                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13403                                  ;
 13404                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 13405                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 13406                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 13407                                  ;	    drive)
 13408                                  ;
 13409                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 13410                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 13411                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 13412                                  ;
 13413                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 13414                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 13415                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 13416                                  ;
 13417                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 13418                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 13419                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13420                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13421                                  ;
 13422                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 13423                                  ;
 13424                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 13425                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 13426                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 13427                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 13428                                  ; 
 13429                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13430                                  
 13431                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13432                                  SenseMediaType:				
 13433 00001306 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 13434 0000130A C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13435                                  		; 10/10/2022
 13436                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 13437 0000130D 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 13438 0000130F 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 13439                                  		;
 13440 00001311 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13441                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 13442                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13443                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 13444 00001315 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 13445                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 13446 00001317 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 13447 00001319 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 13448 0000131B FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 13449                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 13450 0000131D FEC8                    		dec	al
 13451 0000131F 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 13452 00001321 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13453 00001323 0404                    		add	al, 4
 13454 00001325 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 13455 00001327 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13456 00001329 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 13457 0000132B 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 13458                                  GotMediaType:				
 13459 0000132D 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 13460                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13461                                  		; cf = 0
 13462                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 13463 00001330 C3                      		retn
 13464                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13465                                  
 13466                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 13467 00001331 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 13468 00001334 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 13469 00001336 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 13470 00001338 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 13471 0000133B 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 13472                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 13473 0000133D B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 13474                                  SenseErrExit:				
 13475 0000133F B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 13476 00001341 F9                      		stc
 13477 00001342 C3                      		retn
 13478                                  
 13479                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13480                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13481                                  		;db    0
 13482                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13483                                  
 13484                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13485                                  
 13486                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13487                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 13488                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13489                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13490                                  
 13491                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 13492                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 13493                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 13494                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 13495                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 13496                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 13497                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 13498                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 13499                                  ;
 13500                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 13501                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 13502                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 13503                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 13504                                  ;
 13505                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 13506                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 13507                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 13508                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 13509                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 13510                                  ;
 13511                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 13512                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 13513                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 13514                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 13515                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 13516                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 13517                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 13518                                  
 13519                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 13520                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 13521                                  
 13522                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13523                                  
 13524                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 13525 00001343 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 13526 00001346 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 13527 00001348 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 13528 0000134B 7431                    		jz	short mine
 13529                                  
 13530                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 13531                                  
 13532 0000134D 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 13533 00001350 746C                    		jz	short win386call
 13534 00001352 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 13535 00001355 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 13536 00001357 E99700                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 13537                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13538                                  
 13539                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 13540 0000135A CF                      		iret
 13541                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13542                                  
 13543                                  int2f_replace_int13:
 13544 0000135B 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 13545 0000135C 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 13546                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 13547                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 13548                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 13549 0000135E 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 13550                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13551                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 13552                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 13553                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 13554                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 13555                                  		
 13556                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13557                                  		;push	word [Orig13]
 13558 00001363 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 13559                                  		;push	word [Old13]
 13560 00001367 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 13561                                  
 13562                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 13563                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 13564                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 13565                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 13566                                  		
 13567                                  		;mov	[Orig13], dx
 13568                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13569 0000136B 8716[B400]              		xchg	dx, [Orig13]
 13570 0000136F A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 13571                                  		;mov	[Old13], bx
 13572                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13573 00001372 871E[0601]              		xchg	bx, [Old13]
 13574 00001376 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 13575                                  
 13576 0000137A 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 13577                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13578                                  		;pop	bx
 13579 0000137B 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 13580                                  		;pop	dx ; 02/09/2023
 13581 0000137C 58                      		pop	ax
 13582                                  i2f_iret:
 13583 0000137D CF                      		iret
 13584                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13585                                  
 13586                                  mine:
 13587 0000137E 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions
 13588 00001380 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 13589 00001382 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 13590 00001384 7503                    		jnz	short disp_func
 13591 00001386 B0FF                    		mov	al, 0FFh
 13592                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13593                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13594 00001388 CF                      		iret
 13595                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13596                                  
 13597                                  disp_func:
 13598 00001389 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1			; request for installing bds?
 13599 0000138B 7418                    		jz	short do_subfun_01
 13600 0000138D 3C03                    		cmp	al, 3			; get bds vector?
 13601 0000138F 7423                    		jz	short do_get_bds_vector
 13602                                  
 13603                                  ; set up pointer to request packet
 13604                                  
 13605 00001391 1E                      		push	ds
 13606 00001392 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022	
 13607                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13608                                  					; = [0070h:25A0h] = [02C7h:0030h]
 13609                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13610                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav, bx
 13611                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav+2, es
 13612 00001397 891E[1200]              		mov	[ptrsav], bx
 13613 0000139B 8C06[1400]              		mov	[ptrsav+2], es
 13614 0000139F 1F                      		pop	ds
 13615                                  		;jmp	far ptr	i2f_dskentry
 13616                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 13617                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1708h
 13618 000013A0 EA[1907]7000            		jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:dsk_entry ; BIOSDATA:dsk_entry
 13619                                  		;; 17/10/2022
 13620                                  		;;jmp	far DOSBIOSSEG:dsk_entry		
 13621                                  		;jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:i2f_dskentry ; 70h:i2f_dskentry
 13622                                  					; NOTE: jump to a FAR function, not an
 13623                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 13624                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have
 13625                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf
 13626                                  
 13627                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13628                                  
 13629                                  do_subfun_01:
 13630 000013A5 06                      		push	es
 13631 000013A6 1E                      		push	ds
 13632 000013A7 1E                      		push	ds
 13633 000013A8 07                      		pop	es
 13634                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13635 000013A9 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]	
 13636                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13637                                  					; point	ds: -> Bios_Data
 13638 000013AE E8BC03                  		call	install_bds
 13639 000013B1 1F                      		pop	ds
 13640 000013B2 07                      		pop	es
 13641                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13642                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13643 000013B3 CF                      		iret
 13644                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13645                                  
 13646                                  do_get_bds_vector:
 13647                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13648 000013B4 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]			
 13649                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13650 000013B9 C53E[1901]              		lds	di, [start_bds]
 13651                                  		;lds	di, ds:start_bds
 13652                                  ;ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
 13653                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13654                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13655 000013BD CF                      		iret
 13656                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13657                                  
 13658                                  ; 17/10/2022
 13659                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13660                                  
 13661                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 13662                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 13663                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 13664                                  
 13665                                  win386call:				
 13666 000013BE 1E                      		push	ds
 13667 000013BF 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13668                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13669                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 13670 000013C4 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 13671                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 13672 000013C6 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 13673 000013C8 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 13674                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 13675 000013CA 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 13676                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13677 000013CC F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 13678                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 13679 000013CF 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 13680                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 13681 000013D1 8026[6F08]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 13682 000013D6 EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret
 13683                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13684                                  
 13685                                  Win386Init:
 13686                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13687 000013D8 F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 13688                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it win386 or win286 dos extender?
 13689 000013DB 7512                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 13690                                  		;or	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Indicate WIN386 present
 13691 000013DD 800E[6F08]01            		or	byte [IsWin386], 1
 13692                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next, bx	; Hook our structure into chain
 13693                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next+2, es
 13694 000013E2 891E[3D08]              		mov	[SI_Next], bx
 13695 000013E6 8C06[3F08]              		mov	[SI_Next+2], es
 13696                                  		;mov	bx, offset Win386_SI ; point ES:BX to Win386_SI
 13697 000013EA BB[3B08]                		mov	bx, Win386_SI	; 19/10/2022
 13698 000013ED 1E                      		push	ds
 13699 000013EE 07                      		pop	es
 13700                                  win_iret:
 13701 000013EF 1F                      		pop	ds
 13702                                  ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
 13703                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret	; return back up the chain
 13704                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13705 000013F0 CF                      		iret
 13706                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13707                                  
 13708                                  handle_multmult:
 13709 000013F1 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 13710 000013F3 7514                    		jnz	short try_2
 13711 000013F5 1E                      		push	ds
 13712 000013F6 E84500                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13713                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13714                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 13715                                  		;dec	bx
 13716 000013F9 BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 13717 000013FC 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 13718 000013FE 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 13719 00001400 F7D3                    		not	bx
 13720 00001402 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 13721 00001404 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 13722 00001406 43                      		inc	bx
 13723                                  try_1:
 13724 00001407 1F                      		pop	ds
 13725                                  		;jmp	short ii2f_iret
 13726                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13727 00001408 CF                      		iret
 13728                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13729                                  
 13730                                  try_2:
 13731 00001409 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; multMULTALLOCHMA
 13732 0000140B 7530                    		jnz	short try_3
 13733 0000140D 1E                      		push	ds
 13734                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13735                                  		;xor	di, di
 13736                                  		;dec	di
 13737 0000140E BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh	; assume not enough space
 13738 00001411 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
 13739 00001413 E82800                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13740 00001416 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 13741 00001419 7421                    		jz	short InsuffHMA
 13742 0000141B F7DF                    		neg	di		; free space in HMA
 13743 0000141D 39FB                    		cmp	bx, di
 13744 0000141F 7605                    		jbe	short try_4
 13745                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13746                                  		;sub	di, di
 13747                                  		;dec	di
 13748 00001421 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh
 13749                                  		;jmp	short InsuffHMA
 13750                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13751 00001424 1F                      		pop	ds
 13752 00001425 CF                      		iret
 13753                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13754                                  
 13755                                  try_4:
 13756                                  		;mov	di, ds:FreeHMAPtr
 13757 00001426 8B3E[9608]              		mov	di, [FreeHMAPtr]
 13758 0000142A 83C30F                  		add	bx, 15
 13759                                  		;and	bx, 0FFF0h
 13760                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13761 0000142D 80E3F0                  		and	bl, 0F0h
 13762                                  		;add	ds:FreeHMAPtr, bx ; update the free pointer	
 13763 00001430 011E[9608]              		add	[FreeHMAPtr], bx
 13764 00001434 7506                    		jnz	short InsuffHMA

 13766                                  		;mov	ds:FreeHMAPtr, 0FFFFh
 13767                                  					; no more HMA if we have wrapped
 13768                                  InsuffHMA:

 13771                                  try_3:		
 13772                                  		;jmp	short ii2f_iret
 13773                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13774 0000143D CF                      		iret
 13775                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13776                                  
 13777                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13778                                  ;try_3:
 13779                                  		;jmp	ii2f_iret
