 14831                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14832                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14833                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14834                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14835                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14836                                  
 14837                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14838 000017F4 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14839 000017F6 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14839 000017FF 736B6574746520666F-
 14839 00001808 7220647269766520   
 14840                                  
 14841                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14842 00001810 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14842 00001819 65737320616E79206B-
 14842 00001822 6579207768656E2072-
 14842 0000182B 656164790D0A       
 14843 00001831 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14844                                  
 14845                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14846                                  
 14847                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14848                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14849                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14850                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14851                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14852                                  
 14853                                  chkopcnt:		
 14854 00001833 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14855 00001838 C3                      		retn
 14856                                  
 14857                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14858                                  
 14859                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14860                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14861                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14862                                  ;
 14863                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14864                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14865                                  
 14866                                  mediacheck:	
 14867 00001839 E89CF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14868 0000183C 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14869 0000183E E84D01                  		call	haschange
 14870 00001841 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14871 00001843 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 14872 00001846 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14873 00001848 50                      		push	ax
 14874 00001849 52                      		push	dx
 14875 0000184A 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14876                                  					; set logical drive number
 14877 0000184E B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14878 00001850 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14879                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14880                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14881 00001852 5A                      		pop	dx
 14882 00001853 58                      		pop	ax
 14883 00001854 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14884 00001856 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14885                                  
 14886                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14887                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14888                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14889                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14890                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14891                                  ; status.
 14892                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14893 00001859 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14894 0000185D 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14895                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14896                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14897                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14898                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14899 00001861 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14900                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14901                                  
 14902                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14903                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14904                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14905                                  
 14906 00001863 50                      		push	ax
 14907 00001864 51                      		push	cx
 14908 00001865 52                      		push	dx
 14909 00001866 E88DED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14910 00001869 5A                      		pop	dx
 14911 0000186A 59                      		pop	cx
 14912 0000186B 58                      		pop	ax
 14913 0000186C 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14914 0000186E 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14915                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14916 00001870 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14917                                  mediaret:				
 14918 00001872 C3                      		retn
 14919                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14920                                  
 14921                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14922                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14923                                  ; or write.
 14924                                  
 14925                                  mediadovolid:				
 14926 00001873 E820EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14927 00001876 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14928 00001878 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14929 0000187B 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14930 0000187D E9EBF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14931                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14932                                  
 14933                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14934                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14935                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14936                                  ; dos.
 14937                                  ;
 14938                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14939                                  
 14940                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14941                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14942                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14943                                  
 14944                                  checklatchio:	
 14945                                  
 14946                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14947                                  			
 14948 00001880 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14949 00001883 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14950                                  
 14951                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14952                                  
 14953 00001885 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 14954 00001888 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14955                                  
 14956                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14957                                  ; expensive verification.
 14958                                  
 14959 0000188A E809EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14960 0000188D 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14961 0000188F E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14962 00001892 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14963 00001894 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14964 00001896 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14965 00001898 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 14966                                  checklatchret:				
 14967 0000189B E8CDF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14968                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14969 0000189E F9                      		stc
 14970 0000189F 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14971                                  checkret:				
 14972 000018A0 C3                      		retn
 14973                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14974                                  
 14975                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14976                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14977                                  ;
 14978                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14979                                  
 14980                                  checkfatvid:				
 14981 000018A1 E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14982 000018A4 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14983 000018A6 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14984                                  
 14985                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14986                                  
 14987                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14988                                  
 14989                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14990                                  
 14991                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14992                                  ;
 14993                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14994                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14995                                  ;
 14996                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14997                                  ;
 14998                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14999                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15000                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15001                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15002                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15003                                  ;
 15004                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15005                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15006                                  ; routine.)
 15007                                  ;
 15008                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15009                                  
 15010                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15011                                  check_vid:
 15012                                  
 15013                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15014                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15015                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15016                                  
 15017 000018A8 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15018                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15019                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15020 000018AD 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15021 000018AF E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15022 000018B2 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15023 000018B4 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15024 000018B6 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15025                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15026 000018BB 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15027                                  					; if not fat system
 15028 000018BD E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15029 000018C0 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15030 000018C2 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15031 000018C5 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15032                                  					; definitely changed
 15033 000018C8 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15034                                  
 15035 000018CA 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15036                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15037 000018CB E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15038                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15039                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15040                                  		;clc
 15041                                  checkfatret:				
 15042 000018CE C3                      		retn
 15043                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15044                                  
 15045                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15046                                  changed_drv:
 15047 000018CF F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15048 000018D0 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15049                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15050 000018D5 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15051                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15052                                  
 15053                                  ; extended id check
 15054                                  
 15055                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15056                                  
 15057                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15058                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15059                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15060                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15061                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15062                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15063                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15064                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15065                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15066                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15067                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15068                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15069                                  ;
 15070                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15071                                  
 15072                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15073                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15074 000018D6 50                      		push	ax
 15075                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15076                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15077 000018D7 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15078                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15079 000018DA 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15080 000018DC 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15081 000018E0 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15082 000018E2 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15083 000018E5 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15084 000018E9 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15085                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15086                                  					; don't know
 15087 000018EB 58                      		pop	ax
 15088 000018EC EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15089                                  					; reset the flag

 15091                                  
 15092                                  ext_changed:
 15093 000018EE 58                      		pop	ax
 15094                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15095 000018EF 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15096                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15097                                  					; disk changed!
 15098                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15099                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15100                                  		;clc
 15101 000018F0 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15102                                  
 15103                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15104                                  
 15105                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15106                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15107                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15108                                  ;
 15109                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15110                                  
 15111                                  checkio:				
 15112 000018F2 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15113 000018F5 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15114 000018F7 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15115 000018FA 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15116 000018FC E897ED                  		call	GetBp
 15117 000018FF 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15118 00001901 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15119 00001904 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15120 00001906 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15121 00001908 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15122 0000190A 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15123 0000190B C3                      		retn
 15124                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15125                                  
 15126                                  checkioerr:				
 15127 0000190C E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15128                                  
 15129                                  checkioret:				
 15130 0000190F F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15131 00001910 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr
 15132                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15133                                  
 15134                                  no_error_map:				
 15135 00001913 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15136                                  
 15137                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15138                                  
 15139                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15140                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15141                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****

 15143                                  returnvid:

 15145                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15146 00001919 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15147 0000191C B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15148 0000191E F9                      		stc
 15149 0000191F C3                      		retn
 15150                                  
 15151                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15152                                  
 15153                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15154                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15155                                  ;
 15156                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15157                                  ; **trashes si**
 15158                                  
 15159                                  media_set_vid:

 15161                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15162

 15164                                  
 15165                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15166                                  
 15167                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]

 15169                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15170                                  vid_into_packet:
 15171 00001923 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15172 00001924 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15173 00001928 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15174 0000192B 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15175 0000192D 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15176 00001930 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15177 00001933 1F                      		pop	ds
 15178                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15179 00001934 C3                      		retn

 15181                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15182                                  
 15183                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15184                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15185                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15186                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15187                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15188                                  ;
 15189                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15190                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15191                                  ;
 15192                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15193                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15194                                  ;		carry set
 15195                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15196                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15197                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15198                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15199                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15200                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15201                                  ;
 15202                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15203                                  
 15204                                  hidensity:
 15205                                  
 15206                                  ; check for correct drive
 15207                                  		
 15208                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15209 00001935 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15210                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15211                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15212 0000193A 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15213                                  
 15214                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15215                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15216                                  
 15217 0000193C 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15218 00001941 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15219                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15220                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15221 00001943 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15222 00001946 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15223                                  
 15224                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15225                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15226                                  
 15227                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15228 00001948 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15229 0000194C 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15230                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15231                                  					; ffOther
 15232 0000194E 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15233 00001950 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15234                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15235                                  					; ff288
 15236 00001952 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15237 00001954 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15238 00001956 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15239                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15240                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15241 00001959 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15242                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15243                                  					; 2 sides
 15244                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15245 0000195C 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15246 0000195D BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15247                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15248                                  					; & head max
 15249                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15250 00001960 E9A5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15251                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15252                                  
 15253                                  Is720K:
 15254                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15255 00001963 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15256                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15257 00001964 E968ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15258                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15259                                  
 15260                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15261                                  ;dofloppy:
 15262                                  		;retn
 15263                                  
 15264                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15265                                  
 15266                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15267                                  
 15268                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15269                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15270                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15271                                  ;
 15272                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15273                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15274                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15275                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15276                                  ;
 15277                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15278                                  ;
 15279                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15280                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15281                                  
 15282                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15283 00001967 06                      		push	es
 15284 00001968 57                      		push	di
 15285                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15286                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15287 00001969 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15288                                  
 15289                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15290                                  
 15291                                  scan_bds:				
 15292 0000196D 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15293 00001971 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15294                                  
 15295                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15296                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15297                                  
 15298 00001973 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15299                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15300                                  get_next_bds:				
 15301 00001977 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15302                                  					; go to	next bds
 15303 0000197A 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15304 0000197D 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15305 0000197F 5F                      		pop	di
 15306 00001980 07                      		pop	es
 15307 00001981 C3                      		retn
 15308                                  
 15309                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15310                                  
 15311                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15312                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15313                                  ;
 15314                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15315                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change

 15326 00001987 C3                      		retn

 15364                                  
 15365                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15366                                  
 15367                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15368                                  
 15369                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15370                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15371                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15372                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15373                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15374                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15375                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15376                                  
 15377                                  ; set_volume_id
 15378                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15379                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15380                                  ;
 15381                                  ;   on entry:
 15382                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15383                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15384                                  ;
 15385                                  ;   on exit:
 15386                                  ;	carry clear:
 15387                                  ;	   successful call
 15388                                  ;	carry set
 15389                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15390                                  
 15391                                  set_volume_id:				
 15392 00001994 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15393 00001995 50                      		push	ax
 15394 00001996 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15395 00001999 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15396 0000199B E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15397 0000199E 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15398 000019A0 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15399 000019A3 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15400                                  setvret:				
 15401                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15402                                  		; cf = 0
 15403                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15404 000019A6 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15405 000019A7 5A                      		pop	dx
 15406 000019A8 C3                      		retn
 15407                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15408                                  
 15409                                  seterr:					
 15410 000019A9 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15411 000019AA 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15412 000019AB C3                      		retn
 15413                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15414 000019AC 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15415                                  
 15416                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15417                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15418                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15419                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15420                                  
 15421                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15422                                  
 15423                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15424                                  
 15425                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15426                                  ;
 15427                                  ;   on entry:
 15428                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15429                                  ;
 15430                                  ;   on exit:
 15431                                  ;	carry clear
 15432                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15433                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15434                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15435                                  ;
 15436                                  ;	carry set:
 15437                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15438                                  
 15439                                  read_volume_id:
 15440 000019AE 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15441 000019AF 51                      		push	cx
 15442 000019B0 53                      		push	bx
 15443 000019B1 50                      		push	ax
 15444 000019B2 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15445 000019B3 57                      		push	di
 15446 000019B4 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15447 000019B5 07                      		pop	es
 15448 000019B6 BF[AB08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15449 000019B9 BE[9F08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15450                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 15451 000019BC B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15452 000019BF F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15453 000019C1 5F                      		pop	di
 15454 000019C2 07                      		pop	es
 15455 000019C3 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15456                                  					; # of fats
 15457 000019C7 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15458                                  					; sectors / fat
 15459 000019CB F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15460 000019CD 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15461                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15462                                  					;
 15463                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15464                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15465 000019D1 2EA3[AC19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15466                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15467                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15468 000019D5 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15469                                  					; # root dir entries
 15470 000019D9 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15471 000019DB D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15472                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15473                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15474 000019DD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15475                                  next_sec:
 15476 000019DE 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15477 000019DF 2EA1[AC19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15478                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15479                                  					; get sector #
 15480 000019E3 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15481                                  					; sectors / track
 15482 000019E7 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15483 000019E9 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15484                                  
 15485                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15486                                  
 15487 000019EB 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15488                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15489 000019EC 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15490 000019EE 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15491 000019F0 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15492                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15493 000019F4 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15494 000019F6 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15495 000019F8 E81BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15496                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15497 000019FB 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15498 000019FD B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15499 00001A00 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15500                                  fvid_loop:
 15501                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15502 00001A02 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 15503                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15504 00001A04 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15505 00001A06 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15506 00001A09 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15507 00001A0B 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15508 00001A0E 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15509                                  ent_loop:
 15510 00001A10 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15511 00001A13 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15512 00001A15 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15513 00001A16 2EFF06[AC19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15514                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15515                                  					; next sector
 15516 00001A1B E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15517                                  notfound:
 15518                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15519                                  		;xor	si, si
 15520 00001A1D EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15521                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15522                                  
 15523                                  found_vid:
 15524                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15525                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 15526 00001A1F 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15527 00001A20 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15528 00001A22 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15529 00001A23 57                      		push	di
 15530 00001A24 1E                      		push	ds
 15531 00001A25 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15532 00001A26 BF[AB08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15533 00001A29 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15534                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15535 00001A2C F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15536                                  		;xor	al, al
 15537                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15538 00001A2E 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15539 00001A2F AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15540                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15541                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15542                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15543 00001A30 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15544 00001A31 07                      		pop	es
 15545                                  fvid_ret:
 15546                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15547 00001A32 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15548                                  				
 15549 00001A34 58                      		pop	ax
 15550                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15551                                  		; cf = 0
 15552                                  		;clc
 15553                                  rvidret:
 15554 00001A35 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15555 00001A36 59                      		pop	cx
 15556 00001A37 5A                      		pop	dx
 15557 00001A38 C3                      		retn
 15558                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15559                                  
 15560                                  no_vid:
 15561 00001A39 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15562                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15563                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15564 00001A3A EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15565                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15566                                  
 15567                                  readviderr:
 15568 00001A3C 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15569 00001A3D 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15570 00001A3E EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15571                                  
 15572                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15573                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15574                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15575                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15576 00001A40 BE[AB08]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15577                                  		;
 15578                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15579                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15580                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15581                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15582 00001A43 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15583 00001A46 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15584                                  		;
 15585 00001A49 FC                      		cld
 15586 00001A4A C3                      		retn
 15587                                  
 15588                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15589                                  
 15590                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15591                                  ;
 15592                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15593                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15594                                  
 15595                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15596 00001A4B 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15597 00001A4C 56                      		push	si
 15598 00001A4D 51                      		push	cx
 15599                                  		
 15600                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15601                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15602                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15603                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15604                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15605                                  		;cld
 15606                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15607 00001A4E E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15608                                  
 15609 00001A51 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15610 00001A53 59                      		pop	cx
 15611 00001A54 5E                      		pop	si
 15612 00001A55 5F                      		pop	di
 15613 00001A56 C3                      		retn
 15614                                  
 15615                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15616                                  
 15617                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15618                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15619                                  ;
 15620                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15621                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15622                                  
 15623                                  check_volume_id:
 15624 00001A57 57                      		push	di
 15625 00001A58 51                      		push	cx
 15626                                  		
 15627                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15628                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15629                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15630                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15631                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15632                                  		;cld
 15633                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15634 00001A59 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15635                                  
 15636 00001A5C F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15637 00001A5E 59                      		pop	cx
 15638 00001A5F 5F                      		pop	di
 15639 00001A60 C3                      		retn
 15640                                  
 15641                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15642                                  
 15643                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15644                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15645                                  ;
 15646                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15647                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15648                                  ;
 15649                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15650                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15651                                  ;
 15652                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15653                                  
 15654                                  fat_check:		
 15655 00001A61 50                      		push	ax
 15656 00001A62 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15657 00001A64 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15658 00001A67 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15659                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15660 00001A6B 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15661 00001A6D 4E                      		dec	si
 15662                                  okret1:					
 15663 00001A6E 58                      		pop	ax
 15664 00001A6F C3                      		retn
 15665                                  
 15666                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15667                                  
 15668                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15669                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15670                                  
 15671                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15672                                  
 15673                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15674                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15675                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15676                                  
 15677                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15678                                  
 15679                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15680                                  		;db 0
 15681                                  
 15682                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15683                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15684                                  
 15685                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 15686 00001A70 00<rep 10h>             		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15687                                  %endif
 15688                                  
 15689                                  ;align 16
 15690                                  
 15691                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15692                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15693                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15694                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15695                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15696                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15697                                  
 15698                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
 15699                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 15700                                  
 15701                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
 15702                                  
 15703                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15704                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 15705                                  ; ============================================================================
 15706                                  ; end of BIOSCODE
