 32980                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32981                                  ;
 32982                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 32983                                  ;
 32984                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 32985                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 32986                                  ;
 32987                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 32988                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 32989                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 32990                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 32991                                  ;
 32992                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 32993                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 32994                                  ;
 32995                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32996                                  
 32997                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32998                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 32999                                  
 33000                                  DevSetMark:
 33001 00003116 06                      	push	es
 33002                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33003                                  	;push	di
 33004 00003117 1E                      	push	ds
 33005 00003118 56                      	push	si
 33006 00003119 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33007 0000311B 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 33008 00003121 40                      	inc	ax
 33009 00003122 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 33010                                  
 33011                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 33012                                  
 33013 00003126 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 33014 00003127 2EC536[7C03]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 33015                                  
 33016 0000312C 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33017 0000312E FC                      	cld
 33018                                  dsm_again:
 33019 0000312F AC                      	lodsb
 33020 00003130 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 33021 00003132 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 33022 00003134 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33023 00003136 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 33024                                  isit_slash:
 33025 00003138 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 33026 0000313A 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 33027 0000313C 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33028 0000313E EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 33029                                  isit_null:
 33030 00003140 08C0                    	or	al,al
 33031 00003142 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 33032 00003144 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 33033                                  
 33034 00003146 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 33035 00003149 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 33036                                  dsm_next_char:
 33037 0000314C AC                      	lodsb
 33038 0000314D 08C0                    	or	al, al
 33039 0000314F 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 33040 00003151 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 33041 00003153 7403                    	je	short blankout
 33042 00003155 AA                      	stosb
 33043 00003156 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 33044                                  blankout:
 33045 00003158 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 33046 0000315A B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 33047 0000315C F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 33048                                  dsm_exit:
 33049 0000315E 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 33050 0000315F 5E                      	pop	si
 33051 00003160 1F                      	pop	ds
 33052                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33053                                  	;pop	di
 33054 00003161 07                      	pop	es
 33055 00003162 C3                      	retn

 33057                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33058                                  ;
 33059                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 33060                                  ;
 33061                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 33062                                  ;
 33063                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 33064                                  ;
 33065                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 33066                                  ;	in DevSize
 33067                                  ;
 33068                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33069                                  
 33070                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33071                                  SizeDevice:
 33072                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33073                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 33074 00003163 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 33075 00003164 06                      	push	es
 33076 00003165 1F                      	pop	ds
 33077 00003166 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 33078 00003168 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 33079 0000316B CD21                    	int	21h
 33080 0000316D 7237                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 33081                                  
 33082 0000316F 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 33083 00003171 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 33084 00003174 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 33085 00003176 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 33086 00003178 CD21                    	int	21h
 33087 0000317A 7223                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 33088 0000317C 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 33089 0000317F 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 33090 00003182 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffffh paras ?
 33091                                  	;jz	short szdev1		; no
 33092                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33093 00003186 7409                    	jz	short sd_ctp
 33094 00003188 2EC706[AF1F]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 33095                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 33096 0000318F EB0E                    	jmp	short sd_close
 33097                                  sd_ctp:	
 33098                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33099                                  ;szdev1:
 33100 00003191 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 33101 00003193 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 33102 00003195 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 33103 00003197 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 33104 00003199 09D0                    	or	ax,dx ; * ; cf=0
 33105                                  	;
 33106                                  	; 22/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimized)
 33107                                  	; MSDOS 6.22 IO:SYS - SYSINIT:37A6h 
 33108                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33109                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 33110                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 33111                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 33112                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33113                                  	;clc
 33114                                  ;szdev2:
 33115 0000319B 2EA3[AF1F]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size (in paragraps)
 33116                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33117                                  	;clc ; cf=0 ; *	; CLC is not needed here
 33118                                  			; (OR instruction clears CF) - E.TAN 22/07/2023
 33119                                  
 33120                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33121                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33122                                  	; cf=0
 33123                                  	;clc
 33124                                  sd_close:
 33125 0000319F 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 33126                                  					;  carry flag
 33127 000031A0 B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 33128 000031A3 CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 33129 000031A5 9D                      	popf
 33130                                  sd_err:
 33131                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33132                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 33133 000031A6 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 33134 000031A7 C3                      	retn

 33137                                  ;
 33138                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 33139                                  ;
 33140                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 33141                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 33142                                  ;
 33143                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 33144                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 33145                                  ;
 33146                                  ;	Loads a device driver using the 4b03h function call
 33147                                  ;
 33148                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33149                                  
 33150                                  	; 01/11/2022
 33151                                  ExecDev:
 33152 000031A8 2E8B1E[B11F]            	mov	bx,[cs:DevLoadAddr]

 33466                                  ;
 33467                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 33468                                  ;
 33469                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 33470                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 33471                                  ;
 33472                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 33473                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 33474                                  ;
 33475                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 33476                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 33477                                  ;
 33478                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33479                                  
 33480                                  ; 13/05/2019
 33481                                  
 33482                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33483                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 33484                                  
 33485                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33486                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 33487                                  GetHexNum:
 33488 0000329D 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 33489 0000329F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33490                                  ghn_next:
 33491 000032A1 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 33492 000032A4 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 33493 000032A7 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 33494 000032A9 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 33495 000032AC 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 33496 000032AE 50                      	push	ax
 33497 000032AF 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 33498 000032B1 E80210                  	call	delim
 33499 000032B4 58                      	pop	ax
 33500                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33501 000032B5 B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 33502 000032B8 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 33503 000032BA E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 33504                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 33505                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33506 000032BD 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 33507                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33508                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33509                                  ghn_shift1:
 33510 000032BF D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 33511 000032C1 D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 33512 000032C3 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 33513 000032C5 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 33514 000032C7 46                      	inc	si
 33515 000032C8 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 33516                                  ghn_into_paras:
 33517 000032CA 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 33518 000032CD 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 33519 000032D0 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 33520 000032D4 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 33521                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33522                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33523                                  ghn_shift2:
 33524 000032D6 F8                      	clc
 33525 000032D7 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 33526 000032D9 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 33527 000032DB E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 33528 000032DD F8                      	clc
 33529 000032DE C3                      	retn
 33530                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33531                                  ghn_err:
 33532                                  gnib_err:
 33533 000032DF F9                      	stc
 33534                                  ghn_ret:
 33535                                  gnib_ret:
 33536 000032E0 C3                      	retn

 33542                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary

 33545                                  ;

 33657                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33658                                  ;
 33659                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 33660                                  ;
 33661                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 33662                                  ;
 33663                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 33664                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 33665                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 33666                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 33667                                  ;				NC
 33668                                  ;			  else 
 33669                                  ;				CY
 33670                                  ;
 33671                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 33672                                  ;
 33673                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33674                                  
 33675                                  umb_allocate:
 33676                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33677                                  	; ds = cs
 33678 0000333E 50                      	push	ax
 33679 0000333F B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 33680 00003341 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 33681                                  					;   possible
 33682                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33683 00003344 FF1E[C51F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 33684                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 33685                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 33686                                  					; the largest UMB
 33687 00003348 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 33688 0000334A 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 33689

 33700                                  ua_err:

 33716                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33717                                  ;
 33718                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 33719                                  ;
 33720                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 33721                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 33722                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 33723                                  ;			; DS = data
 33724                                  ;
 33725                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 33726                                  ;
 33727                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 33728                                  ;
 33729                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33730                                  
 33731                                  umb_insert:
 33732 0000335A 1E                      	push	ds
 33733                                  
 33734                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33735                                  	; ds = cs
 33736                                  
 33737                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33738 0000335B 8E1E[DC1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 33739                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 33740 0000335F 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 33741 00003363 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 33742 00003365 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33743                                  ui_next:
 33744 00003367 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 33745                                  					;    new block
 33746 00003369 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 33747                                  					; Q: is current block the
 33748                                  					;    last
 33749 0000336B 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33750 00003371 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 33751                                  					; N: get next block
 33752 00003373 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 33753                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 33754 00003375 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33755 00003378 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 33756                                  
 33757                                  ui_insert:
 33758 0000337A 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 33759 0000337C 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 33760                                  
 33761 0000337D 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 33762 0000337F F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 33763                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 33764 00003381 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33765                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 33766 00003386 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33767                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 33768 0000338C 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 33769                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 33770 00003390 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33771                                  
 33772                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33773                                  
 33774 00003396 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33775 00003398 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33776 0000339E 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 33777                                  					; mark as free
 33778 000033A5 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 33779                                  					; start & end of new block
 33780 000033A8 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 33781                                  
 33782                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 33783                                  	
 33784 000033AD 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 33785 000033AF 43                      	inc	bx
 33786 000033B0 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 33787 000033B2 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 33788                                  
 33789                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 33790                                  					; this block
 33791 000033B3 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 33792                                  	
 33793 000033B5 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33794 000033BB 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33795 000033C2 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33796 000033C6 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33797                                  
 33798 000033CD EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 33799                                  
 33800                                  ui_append:
 33801                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 33802 000033CF 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 33803 000033D4 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 33804                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 33805                                  					; block for the next arena.
 33806                                  	; 13/05/2019
 33807 000033DA 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33808                                  
 33809 000033E0 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 33810 000033E2 40                      	inc	ax
 33811 000033E3 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 33812                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 33813 000033E5 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 33814                                  
 33815 000033E7 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 33816                                  
 33817 000033E9 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33818 000033EF 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33819 000033F6 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33820 000033FA 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 33821                                  
 33822                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33823 00003401 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33824 00003403 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 33825 00003409 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 33826                                  					; mark as free

 33828 00003411 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 33829                                  ui_done:
 33830                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 33831 00003416 1F                      	pop	ds
 33832                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 33833                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 33834 00003417 C3                      	retn
 33835

 33837                                  
 33838                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33839                                  ;
 33840                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 33841                                  ;
 33842                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 33843                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 33844                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 33845                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 33846                                  ;
 33847                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 33848                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 33849                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 33850                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 33851                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 33852                                  ;
 33853                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33854                                  
 33855                                  umb_coalesce:
 33856                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33857                                  	; ds = cs
 33858 00003418 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 33859                                  
 33860 00003419 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 33861                                  
 33862                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33863                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33864 0000341B 8E06[DC1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33865 0000341F 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 33866                                  uc_nextfree:
 33867 00003424 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33868 00003426 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33869                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 33870 00003428 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 33871 0000342D 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 33872                                  					; N: get next arena
 33873 0000342F E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 33874 00003432 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33875 00003434 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 33876                                  uc_again:
 33877 00003436 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 33878 00003439 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33879                                  uc_check:
 33880 0000343B 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 33881 00003440 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 33882                                  					; Y: coalesce
 33883 00003442 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 33884 00003447 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 33885                                  	;add	[3],cx
 33886 00003448 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 33887 0000344C 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 33888 0000344F 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 33889 00003451 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 33890                                  
 33891                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33892                                  ;uc_done:
 33893                                  	;retn
 33894                                  
 33895                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33896                                  ;
 33897                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 33898                                  ;
 33899                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 33900                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 33901                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 33902                                  ;
 33903                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33904                                  
 33905                                  	; 01/11/2022
 33906                                  get_next:
 33907 00003453 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33908 00003458 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 33909                                  _get_next_:
 33910 0000345A 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 33911 0000345C 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 33912 00003460 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 33913 00003461 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33914                                  	;clc
 33915                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33916                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33917                                  	; cf=0
 33918                                  	;clc
 33919 00003463 C3                      	retn
 33920                                  gn_err:
 33921 00003464 F9                      	stc
 33922                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 33923                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 33924 00003465 C3                      	retn

 33926                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33927                                  ;
 33928                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 33929                                  ;
 33930                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33931                                  
 33932                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33933                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 33934                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 33935                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33936                                  	; ds = cs
 33937 00003466 E8D5FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 33938 00003469 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 33939                                  
 33940                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 33941                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 33942                                  
 33943                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33944                                  	; ds = cs
 33945                                  
 33946 0000346B CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 33947 0000346D B106                    	mov	cl,6
 33948 0000346F D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 33949                                  
 33950 00003471 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 33951 00003473 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 33952                                  
 33953 00003475 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 33954                                  
 33955 00003477 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 33956 0000347A 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 33957                                  	
 33958 0000347C 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33959 00003482 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33960                                  					
 33961 00003489 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33962 0000348D 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33963                                  
 33964                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 33965                                  
 33966 00003494 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 33967 00003496 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33968 0000349C 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 33969                                  					; mark as free 
 33970 000034A3 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 33971 000034A4 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 33972                                  
 33973                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33974                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33975 000034A9 8E06[DC1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 33976 000034AD BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 33977 000034B0 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 33978                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 33979                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 33980                                  
 33981                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 33982                                  
 33983 000034B3 BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 33984 000034B6 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 33985 000034B9 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 33986                                  ;scan_next
 33987                                  ; 09/12/2022
 33988                                  scannext:
 33989 000034BB 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 33990 000034BF 740C                    	je	short got_last
 33991                                  	
 33992 000034C1 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33993 000034C3 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33994 000034C8 40                      	inc	ax
 33995 000034C9 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33996                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 33997                                  	; 09/12/2022
 33998 000034CB EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 33999                                  got_last:
 34000 000034CD 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 34001 000034D3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34002                                  	;clc
 34003                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34004                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34005                                  	; cf=0
 34006                                  	;clc
 34007 000034D9 C3                      	retn
 34008                                  
 34009                                  ; 11/12/2022
 34010                                  ;;lfu_err:
 34011                                  ;	;stc
 34012                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34013                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 34014                                  ;	; cf=1
 34015                                  ;	;stc
 34016                                  ;	retn

 34019                                  ;
 34020                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 34021                                  ;
 34022                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 34023                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 34024                                  ;
 34025                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34026                                  
 34027                                  ShrinkUMB:
 34028                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34029                                  	; ds = cs
 34030 000034DA 833E[BF1F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 34031                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 34032 000034DF 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 34033 000034E1 06                      	push	es
 34034                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34035                                  	;push	bx
 34036                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34037                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 34038                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34039                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34040 000034E2 8B1E[C31F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 34041 000034E6 2B1E[BF1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34042 000034EA 8E06[BF1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 34043                                  	
 34044 000034EE B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 34045 000034F1 CD21                    	int	21h
 34046                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 34047                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 34048                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 34049 000034F3 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34050 000034F5 48                      	dec	ax
 34051 000034F6 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34052 000034F8 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 34053                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34054                                  	;pop	bx
 34055 000034FF 07                      	pop	es
 34056                                  su_exit:
 34057 00003500 C3                      	retn

 34064                                  ;
 34065                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 34067                                  UnlinkUMB:

 34069                                  	; ds = cs
 34070 00003501 1E                      	push	ds

 34073 00003503 803E[DB1F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 34074                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 34075 00003508 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 34076                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34077 0000350A 8E06[DC1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34078                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 34079 0000350E 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34080 00003513 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 34081                                  ulu_next:
 34082 00003518 E838FF                  	call	get_next
 34083 0000351B 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 34084 0000351D 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 34085 0000351F 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 34086 00003521 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34087 00003523 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 34088                                  ulu_found:
 34089                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 34090 00003525 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34091                                  ulu_x:
 34092 0000352A 07                      	pop	es
 34093 0000352B 1F                      	pop	ds
 34094 0000352C C3                      	retn

 34096                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34097                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 34098                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34099                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34100                                  
 34101                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34102                                  ;
 34103                                  ; Summary:
 34104                                  ;
 34105                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 34106                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 34107                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 34108                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 34109                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 34110                                  ;
 34111                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 34112                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 34113                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 34114                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 34115                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 34116                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 34117                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 34118                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 34119                                  ;
 34120                                  ; Example:
 34121                                  ;
 34122                                  ;   [menu]
 34123                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 34124                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 34125                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 34126                                  ;
 34127                                  ;   [network]
 34128                                  ;   include misc
 34129                                  ;   device=foo
 34130                                  ;
 34131                                  ;   [misc]
 34132                                  ;   device=bar
 34133                                  ;   include alternate
 34134                                  ;
 34135                                  ;   [alternate]
 34136                                  ;   device=tar
 34137                                  ;
 34138                                  ;
 34139                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 34140                                  ;
 34141                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 34142                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 34143                                  ;
 34144                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 34145                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 34146                                  ;   following order:
 34147                                  ;
 34148                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 34149                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 34150                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 34151                                  ;
 34152                                  
 34153                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 34154                                  
 34155                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 34156                                  
 34157                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 34158                                  
 34159                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 34160                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 34161                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 34162                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 34163                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 34164                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 34165                                  
 34166                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34167                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34168                                  
 34169                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 34170                                  
 34171                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34172                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 34173                                  
 34174 0000352D 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 34175                                  
 34176                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34177                                  ;
 34178                                  ; procedure : setparms
 34179                                  ;
 34180                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 34181                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 34182                                  ;
 34183                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34184                                  
 34185                                  setparms:

 34400                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 34401                                  ;
 34402                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 34403                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the

 34405                                  ; error.

 34661                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34662                                  ;
 34663                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 34664                                  ;
 34665                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 34666                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 34667                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 34668                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 34669                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 34670                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 34671                                  ;
 34672                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 34673                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 34674                                  ;
 34675                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 34676                                  ;
 34677                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34678                                  
 34679                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34680                                  
 34681                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34682                                  
 34683                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34684                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 34685                                  
 34686                                  setdeviceparameters:
 34687                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34688                                  	; ds = cs
 34689                                  
 34690 00003657 06                      	push	es
 34691                                  
 34692 00003658 0E                      	push	cs
 34693 00003659 07                      	pop	es
 34694                                  
 34695 0000365A 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 34696 0000365C 8A1E[E148]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 34697 00003660 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 34698 00003663 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 34699

 34767                                  
 34768                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 34769                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 34770                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 34771                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 34772                                  
 34773                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 34774                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 34775                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.

 34783

 34805                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything

 35352                                  ;
 35353                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 35354                                  ;
 35355                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 35356                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 35357                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 35358                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 35359                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 35360                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 35361                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 35362                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 35363                                  ;
 35364                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35365                                  
 35366                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35367                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 35368                                  
 35369                                  skip_comment:
 35370 00003903 E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 35371                                  
 35372                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35373                                  	; ds = cs	
 35374                                  
 35375 00003905 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 35376                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 35377 0000390A 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 35378                                  
 35379 0000390C 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 35380                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 35381 00003911 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 35382                                  
 35383 00003913 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35384                                  	
 35385 00003916 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 35386                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 35387 0000391A 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 35388                                  
 35389 0000391C 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 35390                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 35391 00003921 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35392                                  
 35393 00003923 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 35394                                  	
 35395 00003927 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 35396                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 35397 0000392B 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 35398                                  skip_cmmt:
 35399 0000392D E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 35400 0000392F 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35401 00003932 46                      	inc	si
 35402 00003933 49                      	dec	cx
 35403 00003934 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 35404 00003936 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35405                                  no_commt:
 35406 00003938 C3                      	retn
