 35416                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35417                                  ;
 35418                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 35419                                  ;
 35420                                  ;   INPUT
 35421                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35422                                  ;
 35423                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35424                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 35425                                  ;
 35426                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35427                                  ;       All
 35428                                  ;
 35429                                  ;   HISTORY
 35430                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35431                                  ;
 35432                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35433                                  
 35434                                  kbd_read:
 35435 00003939 F606[AC47]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 35436 0000393E 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 35437                                  
 35438 00003940 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 35439 00003941 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 35440 00003943 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 35441                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 35442                                  kbd_loop:
 35443 00003945 B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 35444 00003947 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 35445 00003949 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 35446 0000394B B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35447 0000394D CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35448 0000394F A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35449 00003951 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 35450 00003953 A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 35451                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 35452                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35453 00003956 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 35454                                  
 35455 0000395B 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 35456 0000395D 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 35457                                  kbd_loopdone:
 35458 0000395F 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 35459                                  kbd_nodelay:
 35460 00003960 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 35461 00003962 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35462 00003964 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35463 00003966 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35464 00003968 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 35465 0000396A 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 35466 0000396B 43                              inc     bx
 35467                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 35468 0000396C 800E[B047]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35469                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 35470 00003971 B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 35471 00003973 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35472 00003975 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 35473 00003977 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 35474 00003979 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 35475                                  
 35476                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 35477 0000397B 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 35478 0000397E 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 35479                                  	
 35480 00003980 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35481 00003983 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 35482                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 35483 00003985 BA[434C]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 35484 00003988 E8F30B                          call    print
 35485                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 35486 0000398B 800E[B047]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 35487 00003990 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 35488                                  kbd_notf5:
 35489                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 35490 00003992 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 35491 00003995 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 35492                                  
 35493 00003997 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35494 0000399A 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 35495                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 35496 0000399C BA[814C]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 35497 0000399F E8DC0B                          call    print           ;
 35498 000039A2 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 35499 000039A4 881E[B047]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 35500                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 35501 000039A8 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 35502 000039AA CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 35503 000039AC C606[B647]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 35504 000039B1 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 35505 000039B3 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 35506                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 35507 000039B5 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 35508 000039B8 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 35509                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 35510 000039BA E88608                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 35511 000039BD F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 35512 000039BE C3                              retn			;
 35513                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 35514 000039BF F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 35515 000039C0 C3                              retn			;
 35516                                  
 35517                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35518                                  ;
 35519                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 35520                                  ;
 35521                                  ;   INPUT
 35522                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 35523                                  ;
 35524                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35525                                  ;       None
 35526                                  ;
 35527                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35528                                  ;       None
 35529                                  ;
 35530                                  ;   HISTORY
 35531                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35532                                  ;
 35533                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35534                                  
 35535                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 35536                                  
 35537                                  set_numlock:
 35538                                          ; 04/01/2023
 35539                                  	;push	ax
 35540 000039C1 1E                              push    ds
 35541 000039C2 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 35542 000039C4 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 35543 000039C6 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 35544 000039C9 2E3B06[1E4C]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 35545 000039CE 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 35546 000039D0 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 35547 000039D5 EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 35548                                  not_off:
 35549 000039D7 2E3B06[1C4C]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 35550 000039DC F9                              stc
 35551 000039DD 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 35552 000039DF 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 35553                                  set_done:
 35554 000039E4 1F                              pop     ds
 35555                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35556                                  	;pop	ax
 35557 000039E5 C3                              retn
 35558                                  
 35559                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35560                                  
 35561                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35562                                  ;
 35563                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 35564                                  ;
 35565                                  ;   INPUT
 35566                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 35567                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 35568                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35569                                  ;
 35570                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35571                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 35572                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 35573                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 35574                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 35575                                  ;
 35576                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35577                                  ;       All
 35578                                  ;
 35579                                  ;   NOTES
 35580                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 35581                                  ;
 35582                                  ;   HISTORY
 35583                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35584                                  ;
 35585                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35586                                  
 35587                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35588                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 35589                                  
 35590                                  menu_check:
 35591                                  
 35592                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 35593                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 35594                                  
 35595 000039E6 51                              push    cx              ;
 35596 000039E7 56                              push    si              ;
 35597 000039E8 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 35598                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 35599 000039EA E84C07                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 35600 000039ED 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 35601 000039EF 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 35602 000039F1 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 35603 000039F3 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 35604 000039F4 EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 35605                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 35606 000039F6 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 35607 000039F8 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 35608 000039FA 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 35609 000039FC 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 35610 000039FE E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 35611 00003A01 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 35612 00003A06 EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 35613                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 35614 00003A08 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 35615 00003A0A 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 35616                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 35617 00003A0C E82A07                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 35618                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 35619 00003A0F 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 35620 00003A11 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 35621 00003A13 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 35622 00003A15 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 35623 00003A17 E81F07                          call    get_char        ;
 35624 00003A1A 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 35625 00003A1C 3A06[0B1F]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 35626 00003A20 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 35627 00003A22 800E[AC47]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 35628 00003A27 EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 35629                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 35630 00003A29 3A06[171F]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 35631 00003A2D 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 35632 00003A2F 800E[AC47]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 35633 00003A34 EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 35634                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 35635 00003A36 E8DA06                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35636 00003A39 EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 35637                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 35638 00003A3B 5E                              pop     si              ;
 35639 00003A3C 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35640                                  
 35641                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 35642                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 35643                                  
 35644 00003A3D F606[AC47]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35645 00003A42 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 35646                                  ;
 35647                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 35648                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 35649                                  ;
 35650 00003A44 E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 35651 00003A47 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 35652 00003A49 E9F601                          jmp	menu_abort
 35653                                  
 35654                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 35655                                  
 35656                                  menu_search:
 35657 00003A4C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 35658 00003A4E BF[F147]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 35659 00003A51 E81804                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 35660 00003A54 733D                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 35661 00003A56 C606[E947]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 35662 00003A5B E91402                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 35663                                  
 35664                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 35665                                  
 35666                                  menu_color:
 35667 00003A5E 51                              push    cx              ;
 35668 00003A5F 52                              push    dx              ;
 35669 00003A60 BA0700                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 35670 00003A63 E8B206                          call    get_number	; get first number
 35671 00003A66 80E30F                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 35672 00003A69 88DD                            mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 35673                                  	; 01/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization) by Erdogan Tan 
 35674                                  	; (high nibble of dl is 0)
 35675                                  	;and	dl,0F0h         ; (low nibble of dl would be zero)
 35676                                          ;or	dl,bl		; (low nibble of dl is 7) ! 14/08/2023
 35677 00003A6B 88DA                    	mov	dl,bl	; 14/08/2023         ;
 35678 00003A6D E84608                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 35679 00003A70 7511                            jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 35680 00003A72 E8A306                          call    get_number	; get next number
 35681 00003A75 80E30F                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 35682 00003A78 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 35683 00003A7A 80E20F                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 35684 00003A7D B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 35685 00003A7F D2E3                            shl     bl,cl           ;
 35686 00003A81 08DA                            or      dl,bl           ;
 35687                                  check_color:                    ;
 35688 00003A83 38F5                            cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 35689 00003A85 7503                            jne	short set_color	; no
 35690 00003A87 80F208                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 35691                                  set_color:
 35692 00003A8A 8816[A747]                      mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 35693 00003A8E 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 35694 00003A8F 59                              pop     cx              ;
 35695 00003A90 E9AB00                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 35696                                  
 35697                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 35698                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 35699                                  
 35700                                  menu_found:
 35701 00003A93 C606[B147]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 35702 00003A98 C706[B347]0000                  mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 35703 00003A9E C606[B547]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35704 00003AA3 8026[B047]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 35705                                  
 35706 00003AA8 E86806                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 35707 00003AAB 29D2                            sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 35708                                  
 35709                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 35710                                  
 35711                                  menu_process:
 35712 00003AAD E88906                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 35713 00003AB0 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 35714 00003AB2 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35715 00003AB4 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 35716 00003AB6 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 35717 00003AB8 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 35718 00003ABA 744D                            je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 35719 00003ABC 3C45                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 35720 00003ABE 7449                            je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 35721 00003AC0 3C41                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 35722 00003AC2 741E                            je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 35723 00003AC4 3C52                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 35724 00003AC6 7496                            je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 35725 00003AC8 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 35726 00003ACA 740F                            je	short menu_numlock ;
 35727 00003ACC 3C30                            cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 35728 00003ACE 746E                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 35729 00003AD0 E8D307                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 35730 00003AD3 7469                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 35731 00003AD5 F9                              stc                     ;
 35732 00003AD6 E83607                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 35733 00003AD9 EB63                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35734                                  menu_numlock:
 35735 00003ADB E8E3FE                          call    set_numlock
 35736 00003ADE EB5E                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35737                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 35738 00003AE0 EB62                            jmp     short menu_getdefault
 35739                                  
 35740                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 35741                                  
 35742                                  menu_default:
 35743 00003AE2 8936[B347]                      mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 35744 00003AE6 803E[B647]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 35745 00003AEB 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 35746 00003AED E8F905                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 35747 00003AF0 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 35748 00003AF2 E80A06                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 35749 00003AF5 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 35750 00003AF7 89DE                            mov     si,bx           ;
 35751 00003AF9 E81C06                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 35752 00003AFC 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 35753                                  	;jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 35754 00003AFF 7602                            jna	short timeout_ok ; 01/08/2023
 35755 00003B01 B35A                    	mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 35756                                  timeout_ok:                    ;
 35757 00003B03 881E[B547]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 35758                                  timeout_skip:
 35759 00003B07 EB35                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35760                                  
 35761                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 35762                                  
 35763                                  menu_item:
 35764                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023
 35765 00003B09 80FA09                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 35766 00003B0C 7330                            jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 35767 00003B0E 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 35768 00003B10 E84003                          call    srch_block      ;
 35769 00003B13 7406                            je	short menu_itemfound ;
 35770 00003B15 F9                              stc                     ;
 35771 00003B16 E8F606                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 35772 00003B19 EB23                            jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 35773                                  
 35774                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 35775                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 35776                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 35777                                  
 35778                                  menu_itemfound:
 35779 00003B1B 42                              inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 35780 00003B1C 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 35781 00003B1E 8887[B747]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 35782 00003B22 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 35783                                  
 35784                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 35785                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 35786                                  ;   description...
 35787                                  
 35788 00003B24 89B7[C147]                      mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 35789 00003B28 89B7[D547]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 35790 00003B2C 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 35791 00003B2E E8B805                          call    skip_token      ;
 35792 00003B31 720B                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 35793 00003B33 E8C905                          call    skip_delim      ;
 35794 00003B36 7206                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 35795 00003B38 87DF                            xchg    bx,di           ;
 35796 00003B3A 89BF[D547]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 35797                                  
 35798                                  menu_nextitem:
 35799 00003B3E E8D205                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35800 00003B41 E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 35801                                  
 35802                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 35803                                  
 35804                                  menu_getdefault:
 35805 00003B44 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 35806 00003B46 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 35807 00003B48 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 35808 00003B4A E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 35809                                  menu_valid:
 35810 00003B4D 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ;
 35811 00003B4F 8816[B247]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 35812 00003B53 8B3E[B347]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 35813 00003B57 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 35814 00003B59 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 35815 00003B5B 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 35816                                  menu_chkdefault:
 35817 00003B5C 53                              push    bx              ;
 35818 00003B5D 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 35819 00003B5F 8BB7[C147]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35820 00003B63 B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 35821 00003B66 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35822 00003B67 06                              push    es              ;
 35823 00003B68 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35824 00003B69 E82703                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 35825 00003B6C 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35826 00003B6D 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 35827 00003B6E 7409                            je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 35828 00003B70 43                              inc     bx              ;
 35829 00003B71 3A1E[B247]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 35830 00003B75 76E5                            jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 35831                                  menu_nodefault:
 35832 00003B77 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 35833                                  menu_setdefault:
 35834 00003B79 881E[B147]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 35835                                  
 35836                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 35837                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 35838                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 35839                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 35840                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 35841                                  ;   with no timeout)
 35842                                  
 35843 00003B7D 803E[B547]00                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 35844 00003B82 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no
 35845 00003B84 F606[B047]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 35846 00003B89 7503                            jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 35847 00003B8B E9C700                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 35848                                  
 35849                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 35850                                  
 35851                                  menu_display:
 35852 00003B8E B40F                            mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 35853 00003B90 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35854 00003B92 B400                            mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 35855 00003B94 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35856 00003B96 06                              push    es              ;
 35857 00003B97 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 35858 00003B9A 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 35859 00003B9C 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 35860 00003BA0 A3[AE47]                        mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 35861 00003BA3 26A06200                        mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 35862 00003BA7 A2[AD47]                        mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 35863 00003BAA A1[A847]                        mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 35864 00003BAD CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35865 00003BAF B80006                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 35866 00003BB2 8A3E[A747]                      mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 35867 00003BB6 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 35868                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 35869 00003BB8 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 35870 00003BBD FECA                    	dec     dl              ;
 35871                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 35872 00003BBF 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]
 35873 00003BC4 08F6                    	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 35874 00003BC6 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 35875 00003BC8 8A36[AB47]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 35876                                  menu_clear:
 35877 00003BCC CD10                            int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 35878 00003BCE 07                              pop     es              ;
 35879 00003BCF 8836[AB47]                      mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 35880 00003BD3 BA[BE4C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 35881 00003BD6 E8A509                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 35882                                  
 35883 00003BD9 F606[AC47]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35884 00003BDE 751F                            jnz     short menu_nostatus
 35885 00003BE0 8A3E[A847]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35886 00003BE4 8A36[AB47]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 35887 00003BE8 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 35888 00003BEA B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 35889 00003BEC CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35890 00003BEE BA[0A4D]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 35891 00003BF1 E88A09                          call    print           ;
 35892 00003BF4 B403                            mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 35893 00003BF6 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35894 00003BF8 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;
 35895 00003BFB 8816[AA47]                      mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 35896                                  
 35897                                  menu_nostatus:
 35898 00003BFF BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 35899                                  menu_disploop:
 35900 00003C02 E8BD02                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 35901 00003C05 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 35902 00003C06 3A1E[B247]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 35903 00003C0A 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 35904                                  
 35905                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 35906                                  
 35907 00003C0C B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 35908 00003C0E 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 35909 00003C10 80C604                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 35910 00003C13 8A3E[A847]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35911 00003C17 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 35912 00003C19 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35913                                  
 35914 00003C1B BA[F74C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 35915 00003C1E E85D09                          call    print           ;
 35916 00003C21 E83603                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 35917 00003C24 BA[CA4A]                        mov     dx,crlfm	
 35918 00003C27 E85409                          call    print           ;
 35919 00003C2A FF36[AC47]                      push    word [bDisableUI]
 35920 00003C2E 800E[AC47]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 35921 00003C33 E87404                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 35922 00003C36 8F06[AC47]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 35923                                  
 35924                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 35925                                  
 35926                                  menu_autoselect:
 35927 00003C3A 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 35928 00003C3D 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 35929 00003C3F E80106                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 35930                                  menu_abort:
 35931 00003C42 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 35932 00003C44 E9EE00                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 35933                                  
 35934                                  normal_boot:
 35935 00003C47 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 35936 00003C4A 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 35937 00003C4C 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 35938 00003C50 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 35939 00003C52 E9F7FD                          jmp     menu_search
 35940                                  
 35941                                  not_topmenu:
 35942 00003C55 80BF[B747]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 35943 00003C5A 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 35944 00003C5C 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 35945 00003C5E 8BBF[C147]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35946 00003C62 E8EE01                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 35947 00003C65 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 35948 00003C67 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 35949 00003C69 E927FE                          jmp     menu_found
 35950                                  
 35951                                  not_submenu:
 35952 00003C6C 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 35953 00003C6E 8B9F[C147]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35954                                  
 35955                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 35956                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 35957                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 35958                                  
 35959                                  no_selection:
 35960 00003C72 891E[B347]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 35961 00003C76 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 35962 00003C7A 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 35963 00003C7C 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35964 00003C7D 8E1E[DD14]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 35965 00003C81 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 35966                                  
 35967                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 35968                                  ;
 35969                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 35970                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 35971                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 35972                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 35973                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 35974                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 35975                                  ;
 35976                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 35977                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 35978                                  
 35979                                  copyblock_loop:
 35980 00003C83 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 35981 00003C84 E83C01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 35982 00003C87 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 35983 00003C88 723C                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35984                                  
 35985                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 35986                                  
 35987                                  copyblock_begin:
 35988 00003C8A 50                              push    ax              ;
 35989 00003C8B 51                              push    cx              ;
 35990 00003C8C 56                              push    si              ;
 35991 00003C8D 57                              push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 35992 00003C8E BF[F647]                        mov     di,szCommon
 35993 00003C91 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35994 00003C92 0E                              push    cs              ;
 35995 00003C93 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35996 00003C94 E8FC01                          call    comp_names      ;
 35997 00003C97 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 35998 00003C98 5F                              pop     di              ;
 35999 00003C99 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36000 00003C9A 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36001 00003C9B 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36002 00003C9C 740F                            je	short copyblock_check
 36003 00003C9E 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 36004 00003CA0 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 36005 00003CA2 57                              push    di              ;
 36006 00003CA3 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 36007 00003CA5 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36008 00003CA6 06                              push    es              ;
 36009 00003CA7 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36010 00003CA8 E8E801                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 36011 00003CAB 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36012 00003CAC 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36013                                  copyblock_check:
 36014 00003CAD 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36015 00003CAF 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 36016 00003CB1 E85F04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36017 00003CB4 EBCD                            jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 36018                                  
 36019                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 36020 00003CB6 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 36021 00003CB9 E87D04                          call    get_char        ;
 36022 00003CBC 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36023 00003CBE 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36024 00003CC0 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 36025 00003CC2 74C6                            je	short copyblock_begin
 36026 00003CC4 EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 36027                                  ;
 36028                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 36029                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 36030                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 36031                                  ;
 36032                                  move_config:
 36033 00003CC6 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 36034 00003CC8 51                              push    cx              ;
 36035                                  ;
 36036                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 36037                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 36038                                  ;
 36039                                   	;mov	cx,7

 36042 00003CCF 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 36043                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 36044                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 36045                                  copy_boot: 
 36046                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 36047 00003CD0 2E                              cs
 36048 00003CD1 AC                      	lodsb
 36049 00003CD2 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 36050 00003CD4 47                              inc     di              ;
 36051 00003CD5 E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 36052                                  
 36053 00003CD7 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 36054                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 36055                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36056 00003CD8 B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 36057 00003CDA 2E8B36[B347]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 36058 00003CDF 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 36059 00003CE1 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 36060 00003CE3 0E                              push    cs              ;
 36061 00003CE4 07                              pop     es              ;
 36062 00003CE5 BE[F647]                        mov     si,szCommon
 36063 00003CE8 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 36064 00003CEB E8B805                          call    any_delim       ;
 36065 00003CEE 7406                            je	short l2	;
 36066 00003CF0 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36067 00003CF2 46                              inc     si              ;
 36068 00003CF3 47                              inc     di              ;
 36069 00003CF4 E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 36070 00003CF6 C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 36071 00003CF9 07                              pop     es              ;
 36072                                  
 36073                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 36074                                  
 36075 00003CFA 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36076 00003CFC 2E893E[DB14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36077 00003D01 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36078 00003D03 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 36079                                  
 36080 00003D04 51                              push    cx              ;
 36081 00003D05 F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 36082 00003D07 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36083 00003D08 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 36084 00003D0A 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36085                                  
 36086                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 36087                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 36088                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 36089                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 36090                                  ;   is empty.
 36091                                  
 36092 00003D0B 06                              push    es              ;
 36093 00003D0C 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36094 00003D0E 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 36095 00003D0F 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 36096 00003D15 E82800                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36097 00003D18 07                              pop     es
 36098                                  
 36099                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 36100                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 36101                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 36102                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 36103                                  
 36104                                  menu_done:
 36105 00003D19 803E[A847]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 36106 00003D1E 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 36107 00003D20 06                              push    es              ;
 36108 00003D21 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 36109 00003D24 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36110 00003D26 A1[AE47]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 36111 00003D29 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 36112 00003D2D A0[AD47]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 36113 00003D30 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 36114 00003D34 07                              pop     es              ;
 36115                                  menu_exit:
 36116 00003D35 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 36117 00003D39 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 36118 00003D3D 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 36119 00003D3F C3                              retn
 36120                                  
 36121                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36122                                  ;
 36123                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36124                                  ;
 36125                                  ;   INPUT
 36126                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 36127                                  ;
 36128                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36129                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 36130                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 36131                                  ;
 36132                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36133                                  ;       None
 36134                                  ;
 36135                                  ;   NOTES
 36136                                  ;       None
 36137                                  ;
 36138                                  ;   HISTORY
 36139                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36140                                  ;
 36141                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36142                                  
 36143                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36144                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 36145                                  
 36146                                  copy_envvar:
 36147 00003D40 51                              push    cx              ;
 36148 00003D41 56                              push    si              ;
 36149 00003D42 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36150 00003D43 06                              push    es              ;
 36151 00003D44 06                              push    es              ;
 36152 00003D45 8E06[DD14]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 36153 00003D49 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 36154                                  
 36155                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 36156                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 36157                                  ;   config.sys line)
 36158                                  ;
 36159                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 36160                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 36161                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 36162                                  
 36163 00003D4A 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 36164                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 36165 00003D4C AC                              lodsb                   ;
 36166 00003D4D 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 36167 00003D4F F9                              stc                     ;
 36168 00003D50 746C                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 36169 00003D52 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr          ;
 36170 00003D54 F9                              stc                     ;
 36171 00003D55 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 36172 00003D57 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf          ;
 36173 00003D59 F9                              stc                     ;
 36174 00003D5A 7462                            je	short copy_envexit
 36175 00003D5C 41                              inc     cx              ;
 36176 00003D5D 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 36177 00003D5F 75EB                            jne	short copy_varlen
 36178 00003D61 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 36179 00003D63 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 36180 00003D65 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 36181 00003D67 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 36182 00003D68 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 36183                                  copy_varsrch:
 36184 00003D6A 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 36185 00003D6D 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 36186 00003D6F 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 36187 00003D71 51                              push    cx              ;
 36188 00003D72 56                              push    si              ;
 36189 00003D73 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 36190 00003D75 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36191 00003D76 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36192 00003D77 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 36193 00003D79 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 36194 00003D7D 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 36195                                  
 36196                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 36197                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 36198                                  
 36199 00003D7F B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36200 00003D82 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 36201 00003D84 56                              push    si              ;
 36202 00003D85 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36203 00003D87 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 36204 00003D89 2E8B0E[DB14]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 36205 00003D8E 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 36206                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 36207                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO:SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 36208                                  
 36209 00003D90 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 36210 00003D91 26                      	es	; 26h
 36211 00003D92 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 36212                                  
 36213 00003D93 5E                      	pop     si
 36214                                  copy_envprep:
 36215 00003D94 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 36216 00003D97 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 36217 00003D99 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 36218 00003D9C 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 36219                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 36220                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36221                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 36222 00003D9E AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 36223 00003D9F 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36224 00003DA1 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36225 00003DA3 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36226 00003DA5 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36227 00003DA7 AA                      	stosb                   ;
 36228 00003DA8 EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36229                                  
 36230                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 36231 00003DAA 51                              push    cx              ;
 36232 00003DAB B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36233 00003DAE F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 36234 00003DB0 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36235 00003DB1 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 36236                                  
 36237                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36238                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 36239                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 36240                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36241                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36242                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36243                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36244                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 36245                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36246                                  
 36247                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 36248 00003DB3 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 36249 00003DB5 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 36250                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 36251 00003DB6 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 36252 00003DB9 2E893E[DB14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36253                                  
 36254                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 36255 00003DBE 07                              pop     es              ;
 36256 00003DBF 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36257 00003DC0 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36258 00003DC1 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36259                                  
 36260                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36261 00003DC2 C3                              retn
 36262                                  
 36263                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36264                                  ;
 36265                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 36266                                  ;
 36267                                  ;   INPUT
 36268                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36269                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36270                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 36271                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 36272                                  ;
 36273                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36274                                  ;       Same as above
 36275                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 36276                                  ;
 36277                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36278                                  ;       All
 36279                                  ;
 36280                                  ;   NOTES
 36281                                  ;       None
 36282                                  ;
 36283                                  ;   HISTORY
 36284                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36285                                  ;
 36286                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36287                                  
 36288                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36289                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 36290                                  
 36291                                  copy_block:
 36292 00003DC3 E87303                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 36293 00003DC6 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 36294 00003DC8 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36295 00003DCA 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 36296 00003DCC 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 36297                                  
 36298 00003DCE 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 36299 00003DD0 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 36300 00003DD2 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 36301                                  
 36302                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 36303                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 36304                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 36305                                  
 36306 00003DD4 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 36307 00003DD9 57                              push    di              ;
 36308                                  
 36309 00003DDA BF[F147]                        mov     di,szMenu
 36310 00003DDD E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 36311 00003DE0 7425                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36312                                  
 36313 00003DE2 BF[F647]                        mov     di,szCommon
 36314 00003DE5 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 36315 00003DE8 741D                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36316                                  
 36317 00003DEA 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 36318 00003DEC E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 36319 00003DEF 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 36320 00003DF1 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36321 00003DF2 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 36322 00003DF4 51                              push    cx              ;
 36323 00003DF5 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 36324 00003DF7 56                              push    si              ;
 36325 00003DF8 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 36326 00003DF9 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 36327 00003DFB E81003                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 36328 00003DFE E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 36329 00003E01 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36330 00003E02 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36331 00003E03 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 36332 00003E05 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36333                                  
 36334                                  copy_skip:
 36335 00003E07 5F                              pop     di
 36336                                  copy_error:
 36337 00003E08 F8                              clc                     ;
 36338 00003E09 E80304                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 36339 00003E0C EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36340                                  
 36341                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 36342                                  
 36343                                  copy_line:
 36344 00003E0E 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36345 00003E10 47                              inc     di              ;
 36346 00003E11 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 36347 00003E13 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 36348 00003E15 2E803E[E014]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 36349 00003E1B 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 36350 00003E1D E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 36351 00003E20 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 36352 00003E22 47                              inc     di              ;
 36353 00003E23 47                              inc     di              ;
 36354 00003E24 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 36355                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 36356 00003E26 E81003                          call    get_char        ;
 36357 00003E29 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 36358 00003E2B 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36359 00003E2D 47                              inc     di              ;
 36360                                  copy_next:
 36361 00003E2E 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 36362 00003E30 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 36363                                  
 36364                                  copy_nextline:
 36365 00003E32 E8DE02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36366 00003E35 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 36367                                  
 36368                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36369                                  ;copy_done:
 36370                                          ;retn
 36371                                  
 36372                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36373                                  ;
 36374                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 36375                                  ;
 36376                                  ;   INPUT
 36377                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 36378                                  ;
 36379                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36380                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 36381                                  ;
 36382                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36383                                  ;       DX
 36384                                  ;
 36385                                  ;   NOTES
 36386                                  ;       None
 36387                                  ;
 36388                                  ;   HISTORY
 36389                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36390                                  ;
 36391                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36392                                  
 36393                                  get_linenum:
 36394 00003E37 50                              push    ax              ;
 36395 00003E38 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 36396 00003E3A 51                              push    cx              ;
 36397 00003E3B 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 36398 00003E3D 56                              push    si              ;
 36399 00003E3E 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36400 00003E43 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 36401                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 36402 00003E45 E8C602                          call    skip_line       ;
 36403 00003E48 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 36404 00003E4A 43                              inc     bx              ;
 36405 00003E4B 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 36406 00003E4D 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 36407                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 36408 00003E4F 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36409 00003E50 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36410 00003E51 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36411 00003E52 C3                              retn
 36412                                  
 36413                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36414                                  ;
 36415                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 36416                                  ;
 36417                                  ;   INPUT
 36418                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 36419                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 36420                                  ;
 36421                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36422                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 36423                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 36424                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 36425                                  ;
 36426                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36427                                  ;       None
 36428                                  ;
 36429                                  ;   NOTES
 36430                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 36431                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 36432                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 36433                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 36434                                  ;
 36435                                  ;   HISTORY
 36436                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36437                                  ;
 36438                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36439                                  
 36440                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 36441 00003E53 50                              push    ax              ;
 36442 00003E54 51                              push    cx              ;
 36443 00003E55 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36444 00003E5A 56                              push    si              ;
 36445 00003E5B 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36446 00003E5D 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36447 00003E5E 06                              push    es              ;
 36448 00003E5F 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36449 00003E60 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 36450 00003E63 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 36451 00003E65 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 36452 00003E67 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36453 00003E68 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36454 00003E69 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36455 00003E6A 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36456                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 36457 00003E6B C3                              retn			;
 36458
