 36459                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36460                                  ;
 36461                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 36462                                  ;
 36463                                  ;   INPUT
 36464                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 36465                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 36466                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 36467                                  ;
 36468                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36469                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 36470                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 36471                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36472                                  ;
 36473                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36474                                  ;       AX
 36475                                  ;
 36476                                  ;   NOTES
 36477                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 36478                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 36479                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 36480                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 36481                                  ;
 36482                                  ;   HISTORY
 36483                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36484                                  ;
 36485                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36486                                  
 36487                                  find_block:
 36488 00003E6C E8CA02                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 36489 00003E6F 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 36490 00003E71 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 36491 00003E73 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 36492 00003E75 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 36493 00003E77 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 36494 00003E79 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 36495 00003E7B 2E800E[E014]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 36496 00003E81 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 36497                                  check_line:
 36498 00003E83 2E800E[E014]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 36499 00003E89 E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 36500 00003E8C 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 36501                                  next_line:
 36502 00003E8E E88202                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 36503 00003E91 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 36504                                  ;find_exit:
 36505                                  ;	retn
 36506                                  
 36507                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36508                                  ;
 36509                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 36510                                  ;
 36511                                  ;   INPUT
 36512                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 36513                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36514                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36515                                  ;
 36516                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36517                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 36518                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 36519                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36520                                  ;
 36521                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36522                                  ;       AX
 36523                                  ;
 36524                                  ;   NOTES
 36525                                  ;       None
 36526                                  ;
 36527                                  ;   HISTORY
 36528                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36529                                  ;
 36530                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36531                                  
 36532                                  comp_names:
 36533 00003E93 57                              push    di              ;
 36534                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 36535 00003E94 E8A202                          call    get_char        ;
 36536 00003E97 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 36537 00003E99 E80A04                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 36538 00003E9C 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 36539 00003E9E 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 36540 00003EA0 47                              inc     di              ;
 36541 00003EA1 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 36542                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 36543 00003EA4 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 36544 00003EA6 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 36545 00003EA8 F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 36546                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 36547 00003EA9 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36548 00003EAA C3                              retn			;
 36549                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 36550 00003EAB 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 36551 00003EAD E8F603                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 36552 00003EB0 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 36553 00003EB2 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 36554                                  
 36555                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36556                                  
 36557                                  comp_names_safe:
 36558 00003EB4 50                              push    ax
 36559 00003EB5 51                              push    cx
 36560 00003EB6 56                              push	si
 36561 00003EB7 1E                              push    ds
 36562 00003EB8 0E                              push    cs
 36563 00003EB9 1F                              pop     ds
 36564 00003EBA E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 36565 00003EBD 1F                              pop     ds
 36566 00003EBE 5E                      	pop	si
 36567 00003EBF 59                              pop     cx
 36568 00003EC0 58                              pop     ax
 36569 00003EC1 C3                              retn
 36570                                  
 36571                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36572                                  ;
 36573                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 36574                                  ;
 36575                                  ;   INPUT
 36576                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 36577                                  ;
 36578                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36579                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 36580                                  ;
 36581                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36582                                  ;       None
 36583                                  ;
 36584                                  ;   NOTES
 36585                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 36586                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 36587                                  ;
 36588                                  ;   HISTORY
 36589                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36590                                  ;
 36591                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36592                                  
 36593                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36594                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 36595                                  
 36596                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 36597 00003EC2 50                              push    ax              ;
 36598 00003EC3 53                              push    bx              ;
 36599 00003EC4 51                              push    cx              ;
 36600 00003EC5 52                              push    dx              ;
 36601 00003EC6 56                              push    si              ;
 36602 00003EC7 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36603 00003EC9 8A3E[A847]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 36604 00003ECD CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 36605 00003ECF 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 36606 00003ED0 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36607 00003ED2 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 36608 00003ED4 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 36609 00003ED7 B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 36610 00003ED9 CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 36611 00003EDB 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 36612 00003EDD 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 36613 00003EDF 8A26[A747]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 36614 00003EE3 3A1E[B147]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 36615 00003EE7 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 36616 00003EE9 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 36617 00003EEC 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 36618 00003EEE B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 36619 00003EF0 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 36620 00003EF2 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 36621 00003EF4 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 36622 00003EF6 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 36623                                  print_other:                    ;
 36624 00003EF9 B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 36625 00003EFB 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36626 00003EFD 8BBF[D547]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 36627 00003F01 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 36628 00003F03 8A3E[A847]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 36629 00003F07 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 36630 00003F09 B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 36631 00003F0C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36632 00003F0E FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36633 00003F10 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36634 00003F12 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36635                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 36636 00003F14 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 36637 00003F17 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 36638 00003F19 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36639 00003F1B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36640 00003F1D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36641                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 36642 00003F1F B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 36643 00003F22 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 36644 00003F24 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36645 00003F26 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36646 00003F28 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36647 00003F2A 06                              push    es              ;
 36648                                  print_loop:                     ;
 36649 00003F2B 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 36650 00003F2E 47                              inc     di              ;
 36651 00003F2F 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 36652 00003F31 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 36653 00003F33 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 36654                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 36655 00003F35 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 36656 00003F37 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 36657 00003F39 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 36658 00003F3B 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 36659 00003F3D B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 36660 00003F3F CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36661 00003F41 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36662 00003F43 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 36663 00003F46 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 36664 00003F48 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36665 00003F4A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36666 00003F4C EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 36667                                  print_done:                     ;
 36668 00003F4E 07                              pop     es              ;
 36669 00003F4F 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 36670 00003F50 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36671 00003F52 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 36672 00003F54 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36673 00003F55 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 36674 00003F56 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36675 00003F57 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36676 00003F58 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36677 00003F59 C3                              retn			;
 36678                                  
 36679                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36680                                  ;
 36681                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 36682                                  ;
 36683                                  ;   INPUT
 36684                                  ;       None
 36685                                  ;
 36686                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36687                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 36688                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 36689                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 36690                                  ;
 36691                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36692                                  ;       None
 36693                                  ;
 36694                                  ;   NOTES
 36695                                  ;       None
 36696                                  ;
 36697                                  ;   HISTORY
 36698                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36699                                  ;
 36700                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36701                                  
 36702                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 36703 00003F5A 8A1E[B147]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 36704 00003F5E 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 36705 00003F60 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 36706 00003F63 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 36707 00003F66 803E[B547]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 36708 00003F6B 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 36709 00003F6D B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 36710 00003F6F CD21                            int     21h             ;
 36711 00003F71 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 36712                                  check_time:
 36713 00003F73 A0[B547]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 36714 00003F76 2A06[B647]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 36715 00003F7A 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 36716 00003F7C 800E[B047]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 36717 00003F81 C606[B647]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 36718 00003F86 E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 36719                                  show_time:
 36720 00003F89 53                              push    bx              ;
 36721 00003F8A 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 36722 00003F8C 8A3E[A847]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36723 00003F90 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36724 00003F92 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36725 00003F94 52                              push    dx              ;
 36726 00003F95 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 36727 00003F98 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36728 00003F9A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36729 00003F9C BA[6A4D]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 36730 00003F9F E8DC05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 36731 00003FA2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 36732 00003FA4 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 36733 00003FA5 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 36734 00003FA7 F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 36735 00003FA9 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 36736 00003FAB 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 36737 00003FAD B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 36738 00003FAF CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 36739 00003FB1 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 36740 00003FB3 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 36741 00003FB5 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 36742 00003FB7 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 36743 00003FB9 5A                              pop     dx
 36744 00003FBA B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 36745 00003FBC CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36746 00003FBE 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36747                                  input_key:
 36748 00003FBF B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 36749 00003FC1 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 36750 00003FC3 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 36751 00003FC5 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 36752 00003FC7 803E[B547]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 36753 00003FCC 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 36754 00003FCE B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 36755 00003FD0 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 36756 00003FD2 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 36757 00003FD4 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 36758 00003FD6 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 36759 00003FD8 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 36760 00003FDA B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 36761                                  got_time:
 36762 00003FDC 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 36763 00003FDE 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 36764 00003FE0 0036[B647]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 36765 00003FE4 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 36766                                  got_key:
 36767 00003FE6 50                              push    ax              ;
 36768 00003FE7 B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 36769 00003FEA 8706[B547]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 36770 00003FEE 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 36771 00003FF0 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 36772 00003FF2 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 36773 00003FF3 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 36774 00003FF6 8B1E[A747]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36775 00003FFA B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 36776 00003FFD CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 36777 00003FFF 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 36778                                  
 36779                                  timeout_disabled:
 36780 00004000 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36781 00004001 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 36782 00004003 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 36783 00004005 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 36784 00004007 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 36785                                  
 36786 00004009 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 36787 0000400B 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 36788 0000400D 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 36789 00004010 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 36790 00004012 FE0E[B147]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 36791 00004016 E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 36792 00004019 FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 36793 0000401B EB12                            jmp     short print1
 36794                                  not_up:
 36795 0000401D 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 36796 0000401F 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 36797 00004021 3A1E[B247]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 36798 00004025 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 36799 00004027 FE06[B147]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 36800 0000402B E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 36801 0000402E 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 36802                                  print1: 
 36803 0000402F 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 36804                                  print2: 
 36805 00004031 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 36806 00004034 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 36807                                  to_input_key:
 36808 00004037 EB86                            jmp     input_key       ;
 36809                                  not_down:
 36810 00004039 F606[AC47]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36811 0000403E 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 36812 00004040 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36813 00004042 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 36814 00004044 8036[B047]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 36815 00004049 E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 36816 0000404C E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 36817                                  not_f8:
 36818 0000404F 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36819 00004051 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 36820                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 36821                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 36822                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 36823 00004053 800E[B047]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 36824 00004058 BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 36825 0000405B B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 36826 0000405D EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 36827                                  
 36828                                  normal_key:
 36829 0000405F 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 36830 00004061 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 36831 00004063 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 36832 00004065 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 36833 00004067 BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 36834 0000406A C3                              retn			;
 36835                                  not_backspace:
 36836 0000406B 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 36837 0000406D 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 36838 0000406F 3A06[B247]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 36839 00004073 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 36840 00004075 A2[B147]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 36841 00004078 E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 36842 0000407B 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 36843 0000407D EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 36844                                  
 36845                                  select_done:
 36846 0000407F B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 36847 00004081 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 36848 00004083 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 36849                                  
 36850                                  	; fall into disp_input
 36851                                  
 36852                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36853                                  
 36854                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36855                                  ;
 36856                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 36857                                  ;
 36858                                  ;   INPUT
 36859                                  ;       AL == character to display
 36860                                  ;
 36861                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36862                                  ;       None
 36863                                  ;
 36864                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36865                                  ;       None
 36866                                  ;
 36867                                  ;   NOTES
 36868                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 36869                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 36870                                  ;
 36871                                  ;   HISTORY
 36872                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36873                                  ;
 36874                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36875                                  
 36876                                  disp_input:
 36877 00004085 50                              push    ax
 36878 00004086 3C20                            cmp     al,' '
 36879 00004088 7302                            jae	short disp_ok
 36880 0000408A B020                            mov     al,' '
 36881                                  disp_ok:
 36882 0000408C 88C2                            mov     dl,al
 36883 0000408E B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36884 00004090 CD21                            int     21h
 36885 00004092 BA[CA4A]                        mov     dx,crlfm
 36886 00004095 E8E604                          call    print
 36887 00004098 58                              pop     ax
 36888 00004099 C3                              retn
 36889                                  
 36890                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36891                                  
 36892                                  disp_num:
 36893 0000409A 53                              push    bx
 36894 0000409B 0430                            add     al,'0'
 36895 0000409D B40A                            mov     ah,0Ah
 36896 0000409F 8B1E[A747]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36897 000040A3 B90100                          mov     cx,1
 36898 000040A6 CD10                            int     10h
 36899 000040A8 5B                              pop     bx
 36900 000040A9 C3                              retn
 36901                                  
 36902                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36903                                  ;
 36904                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 36905                                  ;
 36906                                  ;   INPUT
 36907                                  ;       None
 36908                                  ;
 36909                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36910                                  ;       None
 36911                                  ;
 36912                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36913                                  ;       None
 36914                                  ;
 36915                                  ;   NOTES
 36916                                  ;       None
 36917                                  ;
 36918                                  ;   HISTORY
 36919                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36920                                  ;
 36921                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36922                                  
 36923                                  show_status:
 36924 000040AA 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 36925 000040AB 8B1E[A747]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36926 000040AF B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36927 000040B1 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36928 000040B3 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 36929 000040B4 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36930 000040B6 8B16[AA47]                      mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 36931 000040BA F606[AC47]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36932 000040BF 740E                            jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 36933 000040C1 B200                            mov     dl,0            ;
 36934 000040C3 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36935 000040C5 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 36936 000040C8 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 36937 000040CB CD10                            int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 36938 000040CD EB13                            jmp     short show_done ;
 36939                                  show_onoff: 
 36940 000040CF CD10                            int     10h
 36941                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 36942                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 36943                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 36944                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 36945                                  
 36946 000040D1 A0[664D]                        mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 36947 000040D4 803E[B047]01                    cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 36948 000040D9 7503                            jne	short show_noton ; no
 36949 000040DB A0[624D]                        mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 36950                                  show_noton:                     ;
 36951 000040DE B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 36952 000040E0 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36953                                  show_done:                      ;
 36954 000040E2 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 36955 000040E3 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36956 000040E5 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 36957 000040E7 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36958 000040E8 C3                              retn			;
 36959                                  
 36960                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36961                                  
 36962                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36963                                  ;
 36964                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 36965                                  ;
 36966                                  ;   INPUT
 36967                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36968                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36969                                  ;
 36970                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36971                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 36972                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 36973                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 36974                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36975                                  ;
 36976                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36977                                  ;       AX
 36978                                  ;
 36979                                  ;   NOTES
 36980                                  ;       None
 36981                                  ;
 36982                                  ;   HISTORY
 36983                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36984                                  ;
 36985                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36986                                  
 36987                                  skip_token:
 36988 000040E9 E84D00                          call    get_char
 36989 000040EC 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 36990 000040EE E8B501                          call    any_delim
 36991 000040F1 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 36992                                  skip_check_eol:
 36993 000040F3 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 36994 000040F5 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 36995 000040F7 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36996 000040F9 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 36997 000040FB F8                              clc
 36998                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 36999 000040FC C3                      	retn
 37000                                  skip_token_eol:
 37001 000040FD F9                              stc
 37002                                  skip_token_done:
 37003 000040FE C3                              retn
 37004                                  
 37005                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37006                                  ;
 37007                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 37008                                  ;
 37009                                  ;   INPUT
 37010                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37011                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37012                                  ;
 37013                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37014                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37015                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 37016                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 37017                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37018                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 37019                                  ;
 37020                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37021                                  ;       AX
 37022                                  ;
 37023                                  ;   NOTES
 37024                                  ;       None
 37025                                  ;
 37026                                  ;   HISTORY
 37027                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37028                                  ;
 37029                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37030                                  
 37031                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 37032 000040FF E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 37033 00004102 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 37034 00004105 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 37035 00004107 E8AC01                          call    delim           ;
 37036 0000410A 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 37037 0000410C EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 37038                                  
 37039                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37040                                  ;
 37041                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 37042                                  ;
 37043                                  ;   INPUT
 37044                                  ;       AL == last character read
 37045                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37046                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37047                                  ;
 37048                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37049                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37050                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 37051                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37052                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37053                                  ;
 37054                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37055                                  ;       AX
 37056                                  ;
 37057                                  ;   NOTES
 37058                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 37059                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 37060                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 37061                                  ;
 37062                                  ;   HISTORY
 37063                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37064                                  ;
 37065                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37066                                  
 37067                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37068                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 37069                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37070                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 37071                                       
 37072                                  	; fall into skip_line
 37073                                  
 37074                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37075                                  ;
 37076                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 37077                                  ;
 37078                                  ;   INPUT
 37079                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37080                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37081                                  ;
 37082                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37083                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37084                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37085                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37086                                  ;
 37087                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37088                                  ;       AX
 37089                                  ;
 37090                                  ;   NOTES
 37091                                  ;       None
 37092                                  ;
 37093                                  ;   HISTORY
 37094                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37095                                  ;
 37096                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37097                                  
 37098                                  skip_line:
 37099 0000410E E82800                          call    get_char
 37100 00004111 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 37101                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37102 00004113 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37103 00004115 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 37104                                  skip_line_done:
 37105                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37106 00004117 C3                              retn
 37107                                  
 37108                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37109                                  ;
 37110                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 37111                                  ;
 37112                                  ;   INPUT
 37113                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37114                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37115                                  ;
 37116                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37117                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 37118                                  ;       BX == binary #
 37119                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 37120                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37121                                  ;
 37122                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37123                                  ;       AX
 37124                                  ;
 37125                                  ;   NOTES
 37126                                  ;       None
 37127                                  ;
 37128                                  ;   HISTORY
 37129                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37130                                  ;
 37131                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37132                                  
 37133                                  ; 13/05/2019
 37134                                  
 37135                                  get_number:
 37136 00004118 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 37137                                  num_loop:
 37138 0000411A E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 37139 0000411D 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 37140 0000411F 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 37141 00004121 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 37142 00004123 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 37143 00004125 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 37144 00004127 50                              push    ax              ;
 37145 00004128 B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 37146 0000412B 52                              push    dx              ;
 37147 0000412C F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 37148 0000412E 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37149 0000412F 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 37150 00004131 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37151 00004132 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 37152 00004134 98                              cbw                     ;
 37153 00004135 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 37154 00004137 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 37155                                  
 37156                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37157                                  ;num_done:
 37158                                          ;retn

 37160                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37161                                  ;
 37162                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 37163                                  ;
 37164                                  ;   INPUT
 37165                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37166                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37167                                  ;
 37168                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37169                                  ;       AL == next character
 37170                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 37171                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37172                                  ;
 37173                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37174                                  ;       AX
 37175                                  ;
 37176                                  ;   NOTES
 37177                                  ;       None
 37178                                  ;
 37179                                  ;   HISTORY
 37180                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37181                                  ;
 37182                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37183                                  
 37184                                  get_char:
 37185 00004139 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 37186 0000413C 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 37187                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 37188 0000413E 26                      	es	
 37189 0000413F AC                      	lodsb
 37190 00004140 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 37191 00004142 C3                              retn			;
 37192                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 37193 00004143 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 37194                                  nearby_ret:
 37195 00004146 C3                              retn

 37197                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37198                                  ;
 37199                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 37200                                  ;
 37201                                  ;   INPUT
 37202                                  ;       AL == current command code
 37203                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 37204                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 37205                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 37206                                  ;
 37207                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37208                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 37209                                  ;
 37210                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37211                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 37212                                  ;
 37213                                  ;   NOTES
 37214                                  ;       None
 37215                                  ;
 37216                                  ;   HISTORY
 37217                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37218                                  ;
 37219                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37220                                  
 37221                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37222                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 37223                                  
 37224                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37225                                  query_user:
 37226 00004147 F606[B047]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 37227                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37228 0000414C 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 37229 0000414E E9BA00                  	jmp	skip_all
 37230                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37231                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 37232                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 37233                                  qu_1:
 37234 00004151 F606[B047]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 37235 00004156 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 37236 00004158 50                              push    ax                      ;
 37237 00004159 A0[DF14]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 37238 0000415C F606[B047]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 37239 00004161 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 37240 00004163 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 37241                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37242 00004165 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 37243                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37244                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 37245                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 37246                                  
 37247                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37248 00004167 58                      	pop	ax
 37249 00004168 C3                      	retn
 37250                                  
 37251                                  query_all:
 37252                                  
 37253                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 37254                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 37255                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 37256                                  
 37257 00004169 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37258 0000416A BA[BC4D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 37259 0000416D 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37260 0000416F 7451                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 37261                                  
 37262 00004171 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 37263 00004173 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 37264 00004175 BF[FD47]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 37265                                  find_match:                             ;
 37266 00004178 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 37267 0000417A 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 37268 0000417C 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 37269 0000417E 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37270 0000417F 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 37271 00004181 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 37272 00004183 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 37273                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 37274 00004186 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 37275                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 37276 00004188 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 37277 0000418B B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 37278 0000418D B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37279                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 37280 0000418F 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 37281 00004191 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37282 00004192 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37283 00004194 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37284 00004196 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 37285 00004198 B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 37286 0000419A 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 37287 0000419D 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 37288 0000419F B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 37289                                  cmd_notset:
 37290 000041A1 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 37291                                  line_print:                             ;
 37292                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 37293 000041A3 26                              es
 37294 000041A4 AC                      	lodsb
 37295 000041A5 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 37296 000041A7 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 37297 000041A9 B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 37298                                  non_null:                               ;
 37299 000041AB 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 37300 000041AD 7210                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 37301 000041AF 7506                            jne	short non_space		;
 37302 000041B1 26803C20                        cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 37303 000041B5 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 37304                                  non_space:                              ;
 37305 000041B7 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37306 000041B9 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 37307 000041BB CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37308 000041BD EBE4                            jmp	short line_print	;
 37309                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 37310 000041BF BA[5A4D]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 37311                                  
 37312                                  generic_prompt:
 37313 000041C2 E8B903                          call    print                   ;
 37314                                  input_loop:                             ;
 37315 000041C5 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 37316 000041C7 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 37317 000041C9 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 37318 000041CB 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 37319 000041CD 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 37320 000041D0 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 37321 000041D2 A0[664D]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 37322 000041D5 800E[B047]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 37323 000041DA EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 37324                                  not_func:
 37325 000041DC 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 37326 000041DE 3A06[664D]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 37327 000041E2 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 37328 000041E4 3A06[624D]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 37329 000041E8 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 37330 000041EA 803E[DF14]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 37331 000041EF 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 37332 000041F1 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 37333 000041F3 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 37334 000041F5 800E[B047]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 37335 000041FA A0[624D]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 37336                                  legal_char:                             ;
 37337 000041FD E885FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 37338 00004200 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37339                                  
 37340 00004201 3A06[664D]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 37341 00004205 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 37342                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37343 00004207 F8                      	clc
 37344                                  do_cmd:
 37345 00004208 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37346                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37347                                  	; cf=0
 37348                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 37349 00004209 C3                      	retn
 37350                                  
 37351                                  skip_cmd:
 37352 0000420A 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37353                                  skip_all:
 37354 0000420B B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 37355 0000420D F9                      	stc
 37356 0000420E C3                      	retn

 37402                                  pe_1:

 37413                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37414                                  
 37415                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 37416                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 37417                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 37418                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 37419                                  
 37420                                  disable_autoexec:
 37421                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 37422                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37423                                  
 37424 00004243 F606[B047]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 37425 00004248 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 37426 0000424A F606[A647]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 37427 0000424F 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 37428 00004251 800E[A647]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 37429                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 37430 00004256 810E[B047]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 37431 0000425C BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 37432                                  dae_1:
 37433                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37434 0000425F A0[E546]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 37435                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 37436 00004262 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 37437 00004264 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 37438 00004266 8A1E[E646]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 37439 0000426A B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 37440 0000426C 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 37441 0000426E 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 37442 00004271 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 37443 00004274 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 37444 00004276 881E[E646]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 37445 0000427A 81C3[E746]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 37446 0000427E 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 37447                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 37448 0000427F 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 37449 00004282 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 37450 00004284 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 37451 00004285 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 37452 00004287 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 37453                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 37454 0000428A 8957FF                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 37455                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 37456                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 37457 0000428D C3                              retn
 37458                                  
 37459                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 37460 0000428E 803E[B047]01            	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 37461 00004293 75F8                    	jnz     short disable_exit
 37462 00004295 F606[A647]02            	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 37463 0000429A 75F1                    	jnz     short disable_exit

 37489 000042A6 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 37490 000042A8 7427                    	je	short delim_ret

 37494 000042B0 741F                    	je	short delim_ret
 37495 000042B2 3C5D                    	cmp	al,']'

 37506

 37508 000042BC 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 37509

 37514 000042C4 740B                    	je	short delim_ret

 37516 000042C8 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 37517 000042CA 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 37518 000042CC 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 37519 000042CE 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'

 37522

 37527                                  ;endif

 37552                                  ; 
 37553                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 37554                                  ;
 37555                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37556                                  
 37557                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 37558                                  
 37559                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37560                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 37561                                  mapcase:
 37562 000042DF 51                      	push	cx
 37563 000042E0 56                      	push	si
 37564 000042E1 1E                      	push	ds
 37565                                  
 37566 000042E2 06                      	push	es
 37567 000042E3 1F                      	pop	ds
 37568                                  
 37569                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37570                                  
 37571                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 37572                                  
 37573                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37574 000042E4 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 37575                                  ;else
 37576                                  ;	xor	si,si
 37577                                  ;endif
 37578                                  	; 02/11/2022
 37579                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 37580                                  	;xor	si, si
 37581                                  
 37582                                  convloop:
 37583 000042E6 AC                      	lodsb
 37584 000042E7 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 37585 000042E9 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 37586 000042EB 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 37587 000042ED 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 37588 000042EF 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 37589 000042F1 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 37590                                  noconv:
 37591                                  
 37592                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37593                                  
 37594                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 37595                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37596                                  
 37597                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 37598                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 37599                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 37600                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 37601                                  ;
 37602 000042F4 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 37603 000042F7 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 37604 000042F9 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 37605 000042FB 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 37606                                  check_eol:
 37607 000042FD 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 37608 000042FF 7406                    	je	short convdone
 37609 00004301 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 37610 00004303 7402                    	je	short convdone
 37611                                  ;endif
 37612                                  	; 02/11/2022
 37613 00004305 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 37614                                  convdone:
 37615 00004307 1F                      	pop	ds
 37616 00004308 5E                      	pop	si
 37617 00004309 59                      	pop	cx
 37618 0000430A C3                      	retn
 37619                                  
 37620                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37621                                  ;
 37622                                  ; procedure : round
 37623                                  ;
 37624                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 37625                                  ; perform bounds check.
 37626                                  ;
 37627                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37628                                  
 37629                                  round:
 37630 0000430B 50                      	push	ax
 37631 0000430C 2EA1[6203]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 37632                                  
 37633 00004310 E857CE                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 37634                                  
 37635 00004313 2E0106[6403]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 37636 00004318 2EC706[6203]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 37637 0000431F 2EA1[6403]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 37638 00004323 2E3B06[A502]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 37639 00004328 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 37640 0000432A 2EF606[E414]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 37641 00004330 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 37642 00004332 06                      	push	es
 37643 00004333 56                      	push	si
 37644 00004334 2E8B36[E214]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 37645 00004339 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 37646 0000433B 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 37647 0000433D 48                      	dec	ax
 37648                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 37649 0000433E 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 37650 00004342 2E8026[E414]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 37651 00004348 5E                      	pop	si
 37652 00004349 07                      	pop	es
 37653                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 37654 0000434A 58                      	pop	ax
 37655                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37656                                  	; cf = 0
 37657                                  	; 02/11/2022
 37658                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 37659 0000434B C3                      	retn
 37660

 37671 00004351 E82A02                  	call	print
 37672 00004354 E94CCE                  	jmp	stall

 37697                                  ;
 37698                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37699                                  
 37700                                  todigit:
 37701 0000437A 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 37702                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 37703                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37704 0000437C 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 37705                                  	;cmp	al,9
 37706                                  	;ja	short notdig
 37707                                  	;clc
 37708                                  	;retn
 37709                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37710 0000437E 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 37711 00004380 F5                      	cmc
 37712                                  notdig:
 37713                                  	;stc
 37714                                  notdig2:
