 37717                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37718                                  ;
 37719                                  ; procedure : getnum
 37720                                  ;
 37721                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 37722                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 37723                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 37724                                  ;
 37725                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37726                                  
 37727                                  getnum:
 37728 00004382 53                      	push	bx
 37729 00004383 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 37730                                  b2:
 37731 00004385 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 37732 00004388 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 37733                                  
 37734 0000438A 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 37735 0000438B 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 37736                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 37737                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37738 0000438C B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 37739 0000438E F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 37740 00004390 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 37741 00004391 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 37742 00004393 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 37743 00004396 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 37744                                  
 37745 00004398 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 37746                                  
 37747 00004399 E8FBE5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 37748 0000439C 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 37749 0000439E 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 37750 000043A0 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 37751 000043A2 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 37752 000043A4 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 37753 000043A6 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 37754 000043A8 7417                    	je	short b15
 37755 000043AA 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 37756 000043AF 7410                    	je	short b15
 37757 000043B1 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 37758                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37759                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37760                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 37761                                  	;nop
 37762 000043B3 740C                    	je	short b15
 37763 000043B5 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 37764 000043B7 7408                    	je	short b15
 37765 000043B9 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 37766 000043BB 7404                    	je	short b15
 37767 000043BD 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 37768 000043BF 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 37769                                  b15:
 37770 000043C1 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 37771 000043C6 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 37772                                  b1:
 37773 000043CB 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 37774 000043CD 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 37775 000043CF 5B                      	pop	bx
 37776 000043D0 C3                      	retn
 37777                                  badnum:
 37778                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37779                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 37780 000043D1 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 37781                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 37782 000043D3 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 37783 000043D7 5B                      	pop	bx
 37784 000043D8 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 37785 000043D9 C3                      	retn
 37786                                  
 37787                                  ;****************************************************************************
 37788                                  
 37789                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 37790                                  
 37791                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37792                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 37793                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 37794                                  ;	si = 0
 37795                                  ;	ax = country id
 37796                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 37797                                  ;	bx = file handle
 37798                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 37799                                  ;
 37800                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 37801                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 37802                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 37803                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 37804                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37805                                  
 37806                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37807                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 37808                                  
 37809 000043DA 57                      	push	di
 37810 000043DB 50                      	push	ax
 37811 000043DC 52                      	push	dx
 37812                                  
 37813 000043DD 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 37814 000043DF 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 37815 000043E1 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 37816 000043E4 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 37817 000043E7 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37818                                  
 37819 000043E9 06                      	push	es
 37820 000043EA 56                      	push	si
 37821                                  
 37822 000043EB 0E                      	push	cs
 37823 000043EC 07                      	pop	es
 37824                                  
 37825 000043ED BF[4B46]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 37826 000043F0 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 37827 000043F3 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 37828                                  
 37829 000043F5 5E                      	pop	si
 37830 000043F6 07                      	pop	es
 37831 000043F7 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 37832                                  
 37833 000043F9 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 37834 000043FC 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 37835 000043FF 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 37836                                  
 37837 00004401 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 37838 00004402 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 37839 00004404 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 37840 00004407 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 37841 0000440A E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 37842 0000440D 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37843                                  
 37844 0000440F 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 37845 00004411 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 37846 00004415 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 37847                                  
 37848 00004417 46                      	inc	si
 37849 00004418 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 37850 00004419 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 37851 0000441A 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 37852 0000441B 5F                      	pop	di
 37853                                  
 37854                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 37855 0000441C 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 37856 0000441F 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 37857                                  
 37858 00004421 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 37859 00004424 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 37860 00004426 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 37861 00004429 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 37862                                  
 37863                                  setdoscntry_next:
 37864 0000442B 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 37865 0000442D 46                      	inc	si
 37866 0000442E 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 37867 0000442F E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 37868                                  
 37869 00004431 B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 37870                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 37871 00004434 F9                      	stc
 37872 00004435 C3                      	retn
 37873                                  
 37874                                  setdosdata_fail:
 37875 00004436 5E                      	pop	si
 37876 00004437 59                      	pop	cx
 37877 00004438 5F                      	pop	di
 37878 00004439 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 37879                                  
 37880                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 37881 0000443B 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 37882                                  
 37883                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 37884 0000443E 2E8916[5346]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 37885 00004443 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 37886 00004446 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 37887 00004449 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 37888 0000444C E8E700                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 37889 0000444F 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 37890                                  
 37891 00004451 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 37892 00004453 46                      	inc	si
 37893 00004454 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 37894                                  
 37895                                  setdoscntry_data:
 37896 00004455 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 37897 00004456 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 37898 00004457 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 37899                                  
 37900 00004458 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 37901 0000445B E8AA00                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 37902 0000445E 727D                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 37903                                  
 37904 00004460 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 37905 00004463 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 37906 00004466 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37907 00004469 F9                      	stc
 37908 0000446A CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37909 0000446C 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37910                                  
 37911 0000446E BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 37912 00004471 B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 37913 00004474 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 37914 00004476 F9                      	stc
 37915 00004477 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 37916 00004479 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 37917                                  
 37918 0000447B 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 37919 0000447D 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 37920                                  
 37921 0000447F 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 37922 00004482 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 37923 00004485 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37924 00004488 F9                      	stc
 37925 00004489 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 37926 0000448B 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37927                                  
 37928 0000448D 56                      	push	si
 37929 0000448E BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 37930 00004491 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 37931 00004493 5E                      	pop	si
 37932 00004494 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 37933 00004497 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 37934 0000449A B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 37935 0000449C F9                      	stc
 37936 0000449D CD21                    	int	21h
 37937 0000449F 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37938                                  
 37939 000044A1 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 37940 000044A3 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 37941                                  
 37942 000044A5 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 37943 000044A8 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 37944 000044AB 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 37945 000044AD 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 37946 000044AE 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 37947 000044AF 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 37948 000044B3 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 37949                                  
 37950                                  	;if	bugfix
 37951 000044B5 E83500                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 37952                                  	;endif

 38024                                  getcountrydestination:
 38025                                  
 38026                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38027                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 38028                                  ;
 38029                                  ;input: al - data id
 38030                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 38031                                  ;on return:
 38032                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 38033                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 38034                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38035                                  
 38036                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38037                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 38038                                  
 38039 00004508 51                      	push	cx
 38040                                  	;add	di,74
 38041 00004509 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 38042                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 38043 0000450C 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 38044 0000450F 47                      	inc	di
 38045 00004510 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 38046                                  
 38047                                  getcntrydest:
 38048 00004511 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 38049 00004514 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 38050 00004516 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 38051 0000451A 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 38052                                  
 38053 0000451C 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 38054 0000451F EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 38055                                  
 38056                                  getcntrydest_1:
 38057                                  	;add	di,41
 38058 00004521 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 38059                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 38060 00004524 E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 38061 00004526 F9                      	stc
 38062 00004527 EB0B                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 38063                                  
 38064                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 38065 00004529 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 38066 0000452B 7503                    	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1
 38067                                  
 38068 0000452D 47                      	inc	di			;now di -> cccountryinfolen
 38069 0000452E EB04                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 38070                                  
 38071                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 38072 00004530 26C47D01                	les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 38073                                  
 38074                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 38075 00004534 59                      	pop	cx
 38076 00004535 C3                      	retn
 38077                                  
 38078                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38079                                  
 38080                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 38081                                  
 38082                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38083                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 38084                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 38085                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 38086                                  ;
 38087                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 38088                                  ;	 be moved.
 38089                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 38090                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 38091                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 38092                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 38093                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 38094                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 38095                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38096                                  
 38097 00004536 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 38098 00004537 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38099 0000453A F9                      	stc
 38100 0000453B CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 38101 0000453D 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 38102 0000453E 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 38103                                  
 38104 00004540 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 38105 00004542 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 38106 00004544 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 38107 00004546 F9                      	stc
 38108 00004547 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 38109                                  ricb_exit:
 38110 00004549 C3                      	retn

 38114                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 38115                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 38116                                  %if 0
 38117                                  
 38118                                  set_country_path:
 38119                                  
 38120                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38121                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 38122                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 38123                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 38124                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 38125                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 38126                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 38127                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38128                                  
 38129                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38130                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 38131                                  
 38132                                  	push	si
 38133                                  
 38134                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38135                                  	push	es
 38136                                  	pop	ds
 38137                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 38138                                  
 38139                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 38140                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 38141                                  
 38142                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38143                                  	inc	si
 38144                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 38145                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 38146                                  
 38147                                  scp_default_drv:
 38148                                  	mov	ah,19h
 38149                                  	int	21h
 38150                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 38151                                  
 38152                                  scp_setdrv:
 38153                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 38154                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 38155                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38156                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 38157                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 38158                                  
 38159                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 38160                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 38161                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 38162                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38163                                  	jne	short scp_path
 38164                                  
 38165                                  scp_root_dir:
 38166                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 38167                                  scp_path:
 38168                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 38169                                  
 38170                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 38171                                  scpath_exit:
 38172                                  
 38173                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38174                                  	push	es
 38175                                  	pop	ds
 38176                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 38177                                  
 38178                                  	pop	si
 38179                                  	retn
 38180                                  
 38181                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38182                                  
 38183                                  chk_drive_letter:
 38184                                  
 38185                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 38186                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 38187                                  ;carry set if not.
 38188                                  
 38189                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 38190                                  
 38191                                  	push	ax
 38192                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 38193                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 38194                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 38195                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 38196                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 38197                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 38198                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 38199                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 38200                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38201                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 38202                                  
 38203                                  cdletter_no:
 38204                                  	stc
 38205                                  cdletter_exit:
 38206                                  	pop	ax
 38207                                  	retn

 38209                                  %endif
